1121441.content:
Mick heard giggling from the other stall as a pile of clothes was pushed into his changing room. When inspecting them, it didn't exactly help to make him any happier. He was obviously swapping with a girl younger than him, the clothes were on the smallish side, but looked to not be too small to not fit him, at least he lucked out on that one.

What he didn't luck out on however was the type of clothing. He saw a bra and panties combo laying on top of the pile, both were white and the bra looked to be a small cup, probably due to this girl's age. Looking further he saw a pair of pink skinny jeans and a yellow and white t-shirt as well as some (relatively) comfortable looking shoes with a slight heel.

"Just my damn luck." Mick sighed to himself as he heard the stall next to him open up with massive giggling following.
Reluctantly Mick started getting dressed and pulled up the small white panties and managed to slid them on, though not all that comfortably. The bra went on without much issue as soon as he figured out how to hook them up.

Next he stepped into the pink skinny jeans, which proved to be a very tight fit, though with some effort he managed to squeeze himself into them, though they were a little short, showing a bit more of his ankles, but they managed to reach up to his waist okay. As Mick zipper up his new jeans, he felt something in his pocket, which turned out to be a note.

Mick laid the note to the side as he pulled the tight fitting shirt over his head, which fit him snugly and much like the jeans were a little short, showing off a bit of belly above the jeans.

Taking a deep breath, Mick sat down to squeeze his feet into the girl's shoes, which were too small for him unfortunately, so it hurt his feet a little as he tried his best to make himself able to walk in them, resulting in him eventually just tying them a bit looser and bending his feet in a way to fit into them, though like mentioned before, it wasn't exactly comfortable to do this.

Deciding to finally read the note he found in one of the pockets, he noticed it was definitely a girl's handwriting, but it also looked to be a girl a few years younger than him for sure. Reading the note it said:

"I overheard you talking to those nasty girls, sorry about what they did, but I couldn't pass up this chance to try boy's clothes! Meet me outside, I'll wait for you "

"Great, well at least I get to meet the original owner of these things." Mick said trying to find a bright spot as he put away the note and unlocked the door and scanned the room for the girl wearing his clothes.

112144131.content:
"Fine, but let's exchange information first." Mick reluctantly agreed recognizing his situation.
"I'm Mick, nice to meet you Zoey." The girl said as a grin appeared on her face.
"How old are you?" Mick then asked as the girl checked her new ID.
"I'm 20 years old, you're 15 I believe right?" Zoey replied as Mick checked the ID as well and nodded.

"You say we're swapping lives, but how will anyone possibly believe that?" Mick said skeptically.
"Well, if I do your hair to look like mine and I do mine to look like yours, that should be convincing enough, our voices aren't too different." She said as she changed the tone of her voice to come rather close to Mick's.
"I just barely fit your clothes, I'm not so sure this will be convincing enough." Mick complained as he motioned at the clothes he was now wearing.

"It'll be fine. Oh, I wanted to ask, you're Trish's cousin aren't you?" Zoey asked as Mick looked at her confused.
"I am?" Mick asked back as Zoey nodded. "So that's how you know the girls?" Mick realized.
"Yep, Now that I think about it, if you're her cousin, why don't I give you a ride along with her? I would feel bad leaving a 15 year old girl to walk back home alone." Zoey giggled and Mick walked with her to the car.

Zoey was about to get into the passenger seat as Mick stopped her.
"You're not allowed to drive." Mick said sternly as she glared back.
"Well excuuuse me little girl, but I am Mick, 20 years old, with a license and this is MY car!" She said as she frowned at Mick, with the girls laughing in the background.
Mick was caught off guard but then he got a great idea. "Can I sit on your lap?" He asked.
"Why?" Zoey asked as she took position in the driver's seat.
"I want to sit in your strong lap so you can show me how to drive." Mick said, trying to play the part of a girl and luckily she picked up to what he was trying to say as he took his spot in her lap.

The ride wasn't too eventful other than the girls talking with each other as Mick and Zoey exchanged some looks here and there. Chrissie and Trish seemed to be adjusting to their swapped lives a lot better than Mick was, but Zoey seemed to have realized she needs to learn some things as pointed out by her inability to drive.

Mick and the girls spent some quality time together watching a movie and all was going rather well. Mick still had to adjust to wearing Zoey's clothes, but he started to get used to the very tight pink jeans and yellow top after a while, though he still would rather wear his own clothes of course.

As soon as they left, Zoey and Mick took a spot next to each other. The awkward silence was broken by a very sincere sounding "I'm sorry" Coming from Zoey's mouth.
"First you force me to swap clothes and lives with you and now you say sorry?" Mick said, keeping his tone gentle, sensing the sincerity in her voice.
"I did, I just really wanted a break from being me, I really wish I could just live a happy life for a little while, but stealing yours, I don't think I can be that cruel." Zoey says sad as she looks to be about to burst into tears.
"What are you talking about?" Mick asks trying to comfort her as he put his arm around him.
"My parents don't understand me, they want me to be girly, successful, their little angel, but it's not what I want." She explains. "I like playing games, doing my own thing."
"Did you tell them this?" Mick asked, honestly curious.
"I did but they don't care, I am supposed to be perfect for them, but my happiness doesn't matter." Zoey continued as he Mick gripped her tighter.

"So why did you want to swap lives with me? Why not another girl?" Mick asks as she seems to look happy he is at least listening.
"I asked Trish, but she refused, then she said, she was heading to the pool with someone who'd be willing to do it with me, but I never imagined it would be a boy at first. I acted all cool, but I was shocked at first, though I would be lying if I said your life wouldn't be perfect for me." Zoey said, finally making sense of the situation for Mick.

"I see, so it was Trish that set this up?" Mick asked.
"Trish or her friend, not sure." Zoey then confirmed.
"I'm glad you admitted this to me Zoey, at least now I know your situation."
"If you want to swap back, I understand."

After a few weeks Zoey was supposed to meet back up with Mick, however as they met up, someone else was in her life.
"Cindy?" Zoey asked as she saw her dressed in a pair of pink denim shorts and a white tank top.
"Hey Zoey." She said as she looked at her cousin wearing Mick's black jeans and gray shirt.
"Why are you wearing my clothes?" Zoey asked confused.
"Your friend Mick, he came to visit while he was you and he got so interested in my dress, we swapped." Cindy said grinning.
"I somehow doubt that but what does that mean for now?" Zoey asked.

"We swap back, you become you again and I can become Mick!" Cindy said.
"Are you sure you don't need to swap back with Mick?" Zoey said suspicious.
"He wanted to stay me, he even offered me to become him!" Cindy said.
"Okay fine I guess, let's swap." Zoey said as they went up to her room and they got changed.

Zoey got back into her own life as she pulled on her own panties and bra, stepped into her pink shorts and put them on and pulled her tank top on over her head.
Cindy on the other hand was giddy as she put on the oversized boxers relative to her body but reveled in the feeling. She then put on the jeans and closed the belt quite tightly so it fit her. Lastly putting on the shirt which reached below her butt and lastly put on the socks and sneakers.

"I have to go live my new life, thank you Zoey!" Cindy said as she hurried off away to Mick's house.
"Maybe I should go check on Mick" Zoey thought to herself, not fully believing her.

She was wearing the same thing as yesterday, mostly due to being too lazy to pick something new and her mom finally being a bit less annoying and letting her do her own thing at least a little bit.

"Zoey, thank fuck you showed up, Cindy forced me to swap with her and I can't stand this." Mick said annoyed.
"That is not what I heard." Zoey said as she pulled on Mick's panties.
"So you're here to torment me even further then, fuck off." Mick said really pissed off.
"Wait, so you didn't swap with her because you wanted to?"
"Fuck no, why would I?" Mick complained.

"Oh no, that means Cindy is in my life." Mick then realized.
"Yeah, she said you agreed on that." Zoey said back realizing her mistake.
"And why did you believe her?" Mick said back annoyed.
"Look, I didn't know okay? Let me try to help you." Zoey offered back.

112144131312211122321111111.content:
Mick left the room in a daze confused by all of the events that had transpired so quickly in the past few minutes, ‘How could Cindy be this manipulative?’ Was the only thought going through his head as he was shocked at the fact that at one point he was feeling bad for her, but now he knew he had only one goal in mind, he had to help his friends even if they were the ones who started this inane situation.

Mick took a second to ponder on who to help first, he decided that Trish would be the first person he would save as from the limited information Cindy left him on a piece of paper with their addresses. The girl that stole her clothes appeared to be the closest.

Mick then snuck down the street being careful not to
Be seen by anyone dressed as a 12 year old girl. Eventually though he found the girl hiding out in her house. Mick only had some information to go off from what Cindy told him.

The girls name was Tracy. She was 13 years old. And Judging by her tone of voice she was bratty and probably loved to be pampered for.

Mick went to knock on the door but saw that it was already unlocked. He snuck into the house. Nick was shocked by how messy the place was, ‘I can’t believe that this girls parents don’t look after their house at all’ where the thoughts going through his mind.

Mick turned a corner and saw a pair of high heels in his face. He looked up to see Tracy pretending to be Trish with a smug smile on her face. “Well well well, if it isn’t Zoe what’s a little girl like you doing in my house?”

Mick didn’t even hesitate to answer “you know why I’m here Tracy give me back Trish’s clothes!”

However Tracy just giggled in a high pitch voice annoying Mick. “Oh but I am Trish can’t you tell by my stylish clothes now if you’re just gonna accuse things of me I’d want you to leave!” mocked Tracy knowing Mick would do anything to get them back.

“Just Give them back please I’ll do anything!” Pleaded Mick knowing he was going to regret doing that.

Tracy then smiled at this knowing that she was going to have a lot of Fun with Mick. “Well if you’ll do anything Zoe there is one thing I’d really appreciate a pretty little girl like you doing”.

Mick cringed realising that whatever she was about to demand of him, he was going to hate.

Tracy then smiled and made her demands clear. “For two hours I’d like you too...”

1121441313122111223211111111.content:
“For two hours I’d like for you to be my adorable little maid and clean up my messy house for me” commanded Tracy in a bratty tone with a smug grin stretched across her face.

When Mick heard the demand of Tracy he hated himself for dealing how right he was about hating whatever idea the twisted 13 year old was going to come up with, he hated it more when he realised how long two hours was and how much that would cut into the time he had to get the other girls clothes.

‘I should say no to this brat’ thought Mick enjoying the thought. But he knew when he saw Tracy wearing Trish's black denim shorts, her red tank top, her gray sweater, her black sneakers, and probably her black lace panties and bra. And looked down at himself seeing the pink frilly tank top white shorts and pink sandals he was wearing. He knew that he had to set aside his pride and accept his embarrassing fate.

“Ugh....fine I’ll be your stupid maid and clean up this dump” said Mick reluctantly, making Tracy giggle in childish glee as she dragged Mick into her room where not only was a slightly revealing maid outfit was waiting for him, but also a long stylish jet black wig.

Mick cringed at the sight of everything before him. “Um so I have to wear all of this?” Asked a concerned Mick, however Mick didn’t get a straight answer to that as Tracy just laughed in his face making him feel small.

“Oh yes my lovely Maid you’ll have to wear that complete set and serve me diligently, oh and for the next two hours my name is Mistress Tracy to you understand?” Explained Tracy enjoying the sight of Mick bring forced to grovel before her feet.

While Mick could only sigh in embarrassment at what was happening to him. “Yes Mistress Tracy I’ll get dressed in all of it right away to serve you”. Tracy loves hearing herself be called mistress, it made her feel so powerful.

She left her room to let Mick get changed. When Mick looked at the maid uniform.
He noticed that it was very short and skimpy meaning that a lot of himself would be seen while wearing it, ‘just great first I have to be a 12 year old and now the maid to a 13 year old’ thought Mick, embarrassed by how easily manipulated he was
By the little girls. When Mick looked closer he also noticed something else, a name tag on the costume ‘Milly’.

Mick then sighed once again realising that he was going to have to act like a new person once again as he began to change clothes once again.
And after Ten minutes of agonisingly trying to fit into the small costume, Mick was now ready to unwillingly serve mistress Tracy as Milly.

When Mick left Tracy’s room he cringed, Mick was wearing a tight maids uniform with a short skirt and a girly long jet black wig to make it look more convincing. He wanted to scream but almost instantly he heard the squeals of the annoying girl Tracy. “Oh you look so cute and pretty don’t you Milly, and remember to answer positively or else you can say goodbye to Trishes clothes”. Smugly said Tracy.

Mick took a deep breath realising he would have to embarrass himself once again, and hoping that no one else would no about it.

“Why yes mistress Tracy I feel so cute in my little maid outfit and wig and I love to serve you!” Said Mick in a high pitch effeminate voice trying to sound upbeat and excited to serve Tracy.

Tracy let out a small snicker after hearing this. “Good girl, now hurry up and clean my house Milly, you have a lot of work to do” mocked Tracy knowing how much this must annoy Mick right now as she handed him a feather duster.

Mick just responded with “Yes mistress Tracy” as he got to work, and for the next two hours Mick went through hell as he had to clean a disgusting messy house, dusting shelves, scrubbing toilets, mopping floors, etc. And what was worse that was on top of that Tracy would also call for his services, to fetch her a drink from the kitchen, or massage her feet for her while she watched tv or pose for photos just in case she needs to blackmail him at some point.

And the worst part of it all for Mick was that he had to serve Tracy with a fake smile on his face, while pretending to be a diligent maid humming tunes while cleaning and responding to Tracy’s commands with “Yes Mistress Tracy whatever you want”.

And after two hours of cleaning with the house now looking brad new. Mick worked up the courage to ask Tracy something he might regret. “Mistress Tracy it’s been two hours can I leave now?”

And with the question Tracy smiled at him devilishly responding with....

Mick and Cindy practices for a good few hours while the grown ups were off doing their own thing and after a while of constantly practicing, something strange happened.

Mick got really good at mimicking Cindy's voice, to the point where not only could he talk similar, it became his default voice, whenever he talked it was now with his Cindy voice without effort. The same could be said about his walk, he started to automatically walk with a certain sway in his legs and hips.

Cindy on the other hand started to walk more like a guy and also managed to mimic Mick's voice pretty well and for her too, it became her default voice, though she had to be careful until she actually had Mick's life of course.

"Cindy, I'm home, Zoey will have to leave soon." Auntie yelled as they returned home.
"Okay mommy." Mick said sounding very similar to Cindy as Cindy giggled at the situation.
"You're responded to my name, with my voice." Cindy remarked, talking like Mick.
"I am you aren't I?" Mick said a bit annoyed.

It was early evening when Mick entered the laundry room in the basement of his apartment building carrying an overfilled laundry basket. It was the Friday of the last week before a holiday break many students had already gone home, so the laundry room was empty. Picking out a washing machine, Mick began to load up his laundry. He had a lot of it. Like his usual lazy self, he had been putting off doing his laundry until he could no longer wait. The t-shirt, jeans, and boxers he was currently wearing were the only clothes he had that weren't dirty. Fortunately, there was just enough room in the machine for everything.

Moments after Mick put his change in and started up the machine, a group of three girls entered the laundry room. These three girls were friends that roomed together in one of the other apartments in the building. Mick had got to know them a bit over the course of the semester, so they waved at him as they entered.

"Hey Mick," Brooklyn greeted him, setting her laundry basket on a nearby washer.

"Hey," Mick replied.

Brooklyn was a pretty 20 year old blonde way out of Mick's league, or so he thought. She was quite down to earth and very friendly with everyone in addition to having good looks. A radiant smile could almost always be found on her pretty face, which was framed by her long, straight blonde hair that reached halfway down her back. Today she was wearing a low-cut white top that showed off her nice C-cup breasts and a short denim skirt that showed off her gorgeous legs.

The other two girls were named Maddy and Sarah, both 19 years old.

Maddy was a cool, energetic tomboy Mick also found quite attractive. She wasn't extremely boyish looking, but she wasn't incredibly feminine either. Not one to wear skirts or dresses ever, Maddy was wearing a loose gray tank top with the logo of some band on it, and a pair of super tight black skinny jeans. She also had a plaid flannel shirt wrapped around her waist. In terms of looks, Maddy was less curvy than Brooklyn, but she was still a looker. She had a great butt and perky B-cup breasts too. As usual, her shoulder-length dark brown hair was pulled back into a ponytail.

Then there was Sarah, who was more of a cute nerdy type. She was somewhere between Brooklyn and Maddy on the femininity spectrum. She had black hair cut in a feminine bob style and she wore designer glasses. She had the most slender build of the three girls and she had B-cup breasts like Maddy. Sarah currently wore a short-sleeved light blue top with a somewhat low neckline, and a pair of short denim shorts over a pair of black leggings.

Since they were all indoors, Mick noticed the girls weren't wearing anything on their feet other than their socks, much like he was himself. Without shoes to skew things, Mick noticed all three of them were about the same height, right around 5'7", give or take. Maddy was just slightly taller than the other two and Mick was only just slightly taller than her.

As the girls loaded up their laundry, they chatted amongst themselves. They talked about boys, school, and their plans for the break. Mick didn't really pay attention, instead focusing on his phone while he waited for his laundry. He did notice that despite having drastically different personalities, Brooklyn, Maddy, and Sarah seemed to be quite close friends.

"What about you, Mick?" Maddy asked.

"Huh, what?" Mick responded, suddenly hearing his name.

"We're talking about our plans for the break," Sarah said. "You have anything going on?"

"Oh, no, not really," Mick said. "I'm actually staying here for the break. My folks live on the other side of the country."

"That's cool," Brooklyn said. "There's plenty to do around here."

"Yeah," Mick said before turning his attention back to his laundry. It was time to change over to the dryer. He emptied out his washing machine, dumping the items that couldn't go in the dryer into his empty laundry basket and then loading the rest into the dryer.

Once he was done, he sort of tuned back into the girls' conversation. They were chatting about clothes now. Brooklyn complimented Maddy on how cool her clothes were, Sarah expressed envy of Brooklyn's fashion sense, and Maddy mentioned she was thinking of changing her style up, among other points of discussion. Mick didn't know much about clothes beyond what he found comfortable to wear and what he found attractive on girls, so he tuned out again. That is until the girls dragged him into their conversation again, asking him his opinion on their outfits and other such things.

He did his best to engage with them, finding it nice to have some people to talk to during the boring process of doing laundry. However, he soon had to step out before the dryer finished, having been struck with the sudden need to use the bathroom. The spicy food he'd had for lunch earlier had caught up with him, it seemed.

"Would you girls mind watching my laundry for a few?" Mick asked the girls. "I've gotta run to the bathroom."

"Sure, no problem," Maddy said. "We're gonna be here for a little while anyway."

"Thanks!" Mick said before rushing to the bathroom. He was in such a hurry that he didn't notice Brooklyn, Maddy, and Sarah quietly whispering and giggling to each other as he left.

Mick barely made it in time. He just managed to pull his pants down and sit on the toilet before his bowels began to vacate. What followed was several minutes of discomfort.

The only thing left behind was a laundry basket containing the clean laundry of one of the girls and a note that simply said "enjoy :)" and nothing else.

115.title: More Scenario's

1151.content:
After several months of convincing, some of Mick's friends had finally convinced him to join them at going to a convention. It was fun all in all, there was a lot of stuff to do and it was really really busy and after only a few hours, they had all completely split up due to different interests.

Mick decided to go and take a seat on a bench somewhere while looking around, not feeling particularly interested by anything at the moment. He did however see some cosplayers not too far from him, though all were female, he knew there was a cosplay contest at some point, unsure if it had already taken place or not, but the costumes looked to be really high quality.

"Mind if I take a seat?" One of the cosplayers asked as she split up from the others.
"Of course not." Mick said slightly blushing as he scooched to the side making a bit more space.
"I'm Celina btw." The girl smiled.
"Mick, nice to meet you." Mick responded a bit awkwardly still.
"I saw you looking at us, pretty cool costumes huh?" Celina asked, not helping with Mick's embarrassment.
"Yeah, looks like all of you put a lot of work into them." Mick responded, trying to keep his cool.
"Such a shame they're still a bit uncomfortable." Celina then sighed, shifting a bit in her seat.

"At least you look great in it." Mick then grinned, feeling a bit more comfortable now.
"Yeah well, I wish I didn't have to walk around like this the entire convention." Celina sighed back.
"Oh it can't be that bad." Mick teased.
"I doubt you'd say that if you were wearing it." Celina giggled.
"Well, there is only one way to find that out." Mick joked.
"Is that a challenge?" Celina grinned.

"No." Mick said sternly.
"Oh I think it is, you can't take that back now." Celina giggled.
"It was a joke, I'm not wearing that." Mick gestured over to her.
"Come on, you'd make a girl very happy and if you do, I'll give you my number." Celina suggested, trying to convince him.
"I don't know." Mick said feeling uncomfortable again.
"Come on, please!" Celina said with puppy eyes looking at him.

131.content:
"And that is how you play proper football." Craig said as he nodded approving at his class's latest match. "You did well today, see you again next class where we will do some climbing challenges, class dismissed." He said as he saw the students make their way over to the changing rooms.

Craig was a fairly young teacher compared to most at his school, but it didn't bother him, in fact it made most of the students prefer his classes.
Feeling very happy with his accomplishments today he went back to the teacher's lounge and grabbed himself some lunch before the next class shows up.

"You look exhausted." A female voice said as she said beside him.
"I could say the same to you Francine." He said as his fellow gym teacher joined him for lunch.
"They seem to be more energetic every day." Francine said back.
"From the looks of you, I think you shouldn't have an issue keeping up." Craig chuckled as he looked over at her.
Francine was wearing the standard gym clothes they were required to wear, a shirt with the school logo and some sweat pants, but underneath it all he knew she was athletic. She also stood at about the same height as him at 5''9' at the age of 28.

"I could say the same about you." She said back to Craig as he just laughed nervously.
"Anyway I should get back to class soon for the last group and then get changed and go home." Craig said as he finished his lunch.
"Good luck, I'm going to get changed now and and go home, see you tomorrow!"
"Have a good day." Craig said as he went ahead to teach his last class.

After another exhausting day of teaching, Craig went back to the teacher's lounge to grab his bag. As he was about to walk out to get changed a student approached him.
"Sorry to disturb you but I have a question." A girl said coming up to him, he recognized her as being in his class.
"Sure, give me a moment." Craig said as he put down his bag against the wall and talked to the girl and answered the questions she had about the injuries she had gotten during his last class.
"You don't have to worry, it will heal, but you won't be able to support too much wait on it so you might have to sit out class next time." He reassured her as she went away seemingly happy.

Craig grabbed his back and went into the changing rooms reserved for the gym teachers and opened up his bag.
"What the..." He said as he opened up the bag, not seeing his own clothes in there.
Unbeknownst to him, while he wasn't looking, ..... replaced his clothes with their own in the bag.

After getting dressed, Craig quickly got to his car, avoiding being spotted by anyone. As soon as he got into the car, he felt a note inside his jacket. It was from Francine.

"Hey Craig, sorry for swapping my clothes with yours, I had to meet with my family after work and couldn't show up wearing sports clothes again or they would kill me. I hope you understand and I hope you're not mad, I'll come over tonight to switch back with you I promise!"

Francine thought for a moment about what to do, she could use this to her advantage to win her bet, but she also felt like she had to be fair to the boys.
In the end, Francine decided to...
13122112.title: Some of them have swapped clothes.

choices: We want to see you in each other's clothes before we go!
The pairs that swapped gym clothes, will also swap normal clothes for two days!
We want to do these kind of classes more!
131221123.content:
Francine was tempted to force them to swap clothes so she would win her bet, but she simply couldn't bring herself to do it as she looked at these innocent kids she had involved into her own schemes, but then an idea hit her to compromise.
"Look, why don't you pair up differently, some boys are still willing to swap with you girls, but any of you that don't want to, shouldn't be forced to." Francine suggested as the kids looked up to her and softly smiled.
"I guess we can do that." One of the willing girls was saying as she looked at one of the willing boys.
The remaining girls willing to swap clothes with a boy quickly paired up and exchanged bags as they went into the dressing room with a massive smile on their face, they boys, seemed to also be really happy.

Francine got back to the hall and met back up with Craig as the last kids were now also walking out of the changing room. Doing a quick survey of the room, Craig noticed not all of them had swapped clothes and poked Francine.
"Some of them didn't want to, but I didn't want to force them, so I paired the ones that did want to swap together and allowed the others to keep their own." Francine admitted. Craig was impressed at this, but thinking at his bet, he didn't really want to lose, but he was considering a middle ground, she did do an impressive job after all.

"A lot of you have decided to swap clothes, very impressive and unexpected." Craig starts rallying the class. "About 90% of you swapped clothes with each other, that is a lot, really proud of all of you." Craig continued, but he saw some of the kids that didn't swap step back a little.
"But that is not to say the ones that didn't are weird or cowardly, it also takes courage to stand by yourself and don't give into pressure, some would argue it takes even more courage instead." Francine than added, backing him up.
"We have set up a very interesting class today." Craig continued as he winked at Francine, he was just pulling this one out of his ass after all and didn't know how anyone would react.
"I am actually very glad some of you kept your own clothes, because as some of you may have noticed, in the past we have divided the boys and girls before for various means."

Francine was starting to catch on now. "When we had big classes like these previously, we always separated the girls to do dancing and acrobatics, while the boys were getting taught basic self defense and did exercises like push-ups." This was true, they did this to be able to manage them better.
"Now, we flip those roles, all the boys wearing the girl's gym clothes, will be treated as girls today and will do dancing and acrobatics, while the girls wearing the boy's gym clothes will be doing self defense and push-ups. The ones still in their own clothes, will be assisting up with teaching it." Craig finished causing a very mixed reaction from the group.
"To mix things up further, I will be teaching the "boys" and Craig will be teaching the "girls"" Francine added last as everyone started to talk about what they just heard.

"Nice going." Francine giggled to Craig as the kids were talking.
"You too." Craig added as he went to round up everyone to their respective exercises.
The class went okay, with some minor hiccups here and there like Craig messing up a dance or two or Francine failing to show some proper self defense techniques. What started as a nervous group of boys, ended up laughing and having fun with the failed attempts at dancing and some face plants during acrobatics.
The girls were a bit scared at first but ended up really liking the self defense potions, though most of them hated the tough push-ups and complained a bit, but in the end it was fine.

After their long and strange gymnastics class, which Craig purposefully ended a bit short of time so he could talk a bit more, everyone was enjoying themselves. The kids all met up with their swapping partner, if applicable and stood in line, most of the girls were giggling and some of the boys were trying to act tough around them, to no avail.

"Alright, I ended a bit short, because I wanted to talk a little bit, first of all, I am very proud of all of you and it looks like you really enjoyed it too!" Craig said excited being met with smiled in front of him.
"There is one more thing I want to tell you, about Francine and I, and no we are not dating in case you're reaching to conclusions." Craig continued as some of the girls laughed at his comment while Francine was just awkwardly blushing, having no idea what he was going to say.
"Francine and I, we made a bet." Craig then said, causing Francine to immediately stop and realize exactly what bet he meant.
"Francine claimed, she could get every single one of you to swap clothes, just like she did with me beforehand." This caused some of the kids that didn't swap to look at her a bit guilty.
"I told her she couldn't, but don't worry, this bet isn't the reason we decided to do this, it was just something on the side I thought was worth mentioning." Craig then continued calming some of the kids down.

"What were the stakes?" One of the kids asked, causing Craig to grin.
"Well, if I won, Francine would have to swap back gym clothes with me immediately and make me lunch." Craig said grinning while a lot of kids started to look at Francine, thinking it wasn't too bad.
"But, so many of you did actually swap, that I think I will meet Francine halfway, I get her lunch, but we don't swap back our gym clothes immediately." Craig then announced, causing Francine to lighten up slightly.
"But as well as this, I will meet her win halfway as well. If she would have won, I would have had to swap my normal clothes with her for an entire week, but I will accept this for two days due to so many of you actually doing this." Craig finally declared standing there embarrassed as the entire group started laughing and applauding.

Francine smiled immensely as she walked up to Craig while the group started to calm down slightly.
As Francine and Craig were about to end the class, the group was conversing a bit together and yelled "STOP!........"
131221123.title: Pair the willing students with each other and l...

1312211232.content:
"We will swap our normal clothes too!" Some of the kids then declared, eventually resulting in all the kids that swapped gym clothes to agree to swap normal clothes as well.
"Are you all sure about that?" Craig and Francine asked a bit taken aback.
"We are!" They then declared as some of the kids, in small numbers at a time, went inside the changing room to grab their normal clothes to give them to their new owner. Only a very small amount of them, but some of them decided to include underwear as well, which shocked not only Craig and Francine, but also some of the kids as well.

The kids then quickly paired up with their partners and passed their clothes to each other. Most of the girls were giggling as they gave the boys their clothes, varying from skirts to shorts to skinny jeans with several girly tops or sweaters being passed around along with them. The girls got the boys jeans or shorts in return with usually a plain t-shirt, which made it seem like a very one sided deal to some of the boys.

"We will meet you in the entrance hall after you get done changing, now off you go." Craig concluded the class as most of the boys took the girly clothes with them into the changing room and most of the girls took their clothes. Craig and Francine kept on their gym clothes for now, not wanting to change multiple times and made their way to the entrance hall.
They could hear a lot of giggles from the girls' locker room while most of the boys seemed to be either silent or cracking jokes to make light of the situation.

The girls came out surprisingly quickly, but the boys followed shortly after. The kids all paired up again with their partner to check out the swaps and it immediately caused a lot of girls to giggle madly.

Most of the girls were now dressed in one of the boys' clothes. The majority was now dressed in some baggy jeans and a somewhat loose t-shirt, which the girls seemed to enjoy. Some of them were wearing some long shorts instead of jeans, but weren't any less happy with them. Some of the girlier girls had some trouble adjusting, but most of them didn't swap anyway so it wasn't that big of a deal for them, they just awkwardly stared at the ones that did. The swapped girls were now also wearing the boys' sneakers and such, which were a bit too big for most of them, but they could walk on them without too much issue.

The boys however, were mostly a little less amused, but much more amusing to see. Like the girls, the vast majority was wearing skinny jeans now, ranging from various colors. For the boys however, most seemed to be a bit too tight for their liking, but since they all paired up with someone relatively close in size, they mostly all fit. Aside from these, there were also boys that ended up with a skirt or leggings, with the boys wearing skirts being the main focus of all the jokes. Some of the boys really tried to own it however, saying they knew they looked great and some of the girls seemed to agree the sight of a boy in their skirt was great indeed. The boys were also now wearing the girls' tops, some of them being a bit revealing, but most of them didn't seem to mind much as they were more focused on their new legwear. Lastly, these boys were also now wearing the girls' sneaker, boots and other footwear, but they were slightly too small for most of them, but they could barely walk on them, even if it looked ridiculous.

After some laughs and even pictures, the kids settled down and all thanked Craig and Francine before heading off to class.
"I'm surprised they did that, I hope they don't get into trouble in their other classes." Craig chuckled.
"Most of them are swapped, so I doubt it would be that big of a deal, besides, it seemed like most of the boys were already getting used to their new outfits." Francine giggled.
"Yeah, I wonder what their parents will think though, we better not get any backlash from this." Craig said worried.
"The thing you should be worried about it wearing my clothes for two days, but there is one detail you left out when you told the class." Francine teased.
"What detail?" Craig said confused not sure what she meant.
"The bet was to swap ALL our clothes, so we have some things to trade after work." She winked as she started to think of a plan.
"Oh right, so that means everything in our wardrobes as well doesn't it?" Craig said remembering now.
"It does, but moving them can be such a pain, so I have a separate suggestion if you want it." Francine started. "We could just swap apartments instead! Then we don't have to move all our clothes." She then suggested with a smile.

Craig thought about it, it wasn't as bad of an idea as he may initially think, but would he really swap apartments with her like that? What else would that include that he wouldn't want?
"......" Craig replied as they walked back into the teachers' changing room.

Craig did the same and started to put on Francine's sneakers, which were quite tight as her feet were a bit smaller. Francine had to tie the laces of Craig's shoes slightly tighter, but she managed to walk around in them well enough because of that as well, joining Craig in an attempt to get used to them, which they both did rather quickly.

"Fine, we can swap cars too while we're at it, you want my ID too?" Craig joked as Francine rolled her eyes.
"It just makes sense okay?" Francine said annoyed.
"Sorry, was just joking." Craig then clarified as he took out his own keys and handed them to Francine.
"Pleasure doing business with you." Francine then laughed as Craig nodded with a smile.

The pair then waved each other goodbye and got into each other's car. Craig kind of liked Francine's car, it had very comfortable seats and quickly got used to driving it. He had to use some navigation in order to find Francine's apartment however, he had never been there before, but he got there without too much issue, parked the car and unlocked the door.

Craig pulled off the leggings, black jacket and pink top and threw them on top of another pile of laundry, which looked like he would have to do soon. He also squeezed his feet out of the tight pink sneakers and started searching for Francine's bedroom.

Craig was really enjoying this moment, he had applied to a college for an open position as a physical instructor. He was going to teach some classes that were required to keep in good physical condition, although this did not apply for all studies on the premises.

He was told he could assist on a few classes at first, which he did teach alongside another instructor, but only a few weeks later he was told he would get to teach some classes on his own and at the end, depending on the results, which would be both from a small physical exam and from the students' responses.

His last class of this period had just come to an end and all students were told to fill in some forms on their experience and were told the physical exam would be done by a different teacher later that day.

As everyone left the gym, Craig was approached by one of the girls in the class. It still was a bit of a change of pace for him, he was used to teaching high school kids, so now teaching and helping college kids was a different, but welcome step up.

The girl who approached him was called Veronica, she was only a little shorter than him and quite athletic. She was a beautiful girl with long smooth legs, flowing chestnut colored hair and had a cheerful, although a bit cheeky of a personality.

"I'm sorry to bother you, but I had a question on the physical exam today." Veronica said.
"I'm not sure how much I could help you there, but try me." Craig replied with a warm smile.
"It's not got anything to do with the specifics, but I was wondering if you could sign this for me?" Veronica said handing him a form and a pen.
"I'm not sure I can sign anything for you yet, what's it about?" Craig said glancing over it.
"I have a family matter I need to attend later today, at the time of the exam. I discussed it with the commission and they said it was fine, but because the exam would have to be rescheduled for me and that may have impact on your results, I need your signature." She explained.
"Okay sure, I can believe that." Craig said as he pressed the pen.

As Craig pressed the pen to put his signature, the pen shot out ink all over him, staining his sports attire. He did have his regular clothes with him as well luckily, but since they were some jeans and a t-shirt, it wouldn't be the best for use during class.
"Oh my god, I'm so sorry!" Veronica said as she saw the events happen before her eyes.
"Don't worry about it, it's not your fault." Craig said reassuring.
"Are you sure?" She asked.
"Yeah of course, there are laundry machines we can use for these kind of incidents, I'll just throw these in there, put on my regular clothes and sign it for you in my office, I'll make sure the commission gets it before the exams." Craig smiled and Veronica nodded thanking him.

Craig did what he said he would do, he took off the stained clothes and threw it in the laundry machine on the premises. He took his bag with him, containing his other stuff and as soon as he managed to turn on the machine, opened his bag to get changed.
What Craig didn't however, it while Veronica was telling the truth about having to leave, she and her friends also took this as a good opportunity to prank him. The pen was tampered with and was rigged to burst out the ink, but while he was distracted talking to Veronica, her friends managed to get to his bag unnoticed until now.

As Craig opened his bag, he noticed the little prank they pulled. While Craig was occupied, Veronica's friends swapped out his clothes for those of....

1511.content:
Sam sighed as he lounged on the couch. He had gone and crawled out of bed, taken a shower, and gotten all ready for school on this particular Wednesday morning only to remember that his high school was doing this new delayed start thing on Wednesdays. He didn't need to be at school for another hour, so here he was wishing he could've got a little more sleep.

As he leaned back, his head hanging off the back of the couch, Sam noticed his twin sister Sabrina coming down the stairs. "What are you doing up already?" she asked when she saw her brother. "Did you forget we didn't have to get up early again?"

"Yup," Sam grumbled. "But what about you? Why are you up?"

"I've got this dumb History test today I need to study for," Sabrina explained as she plopped herself down on the couch next to Sam. She didn't sound particularly thrilled.

Sam couldn't blame her. He knew his sister wasn't great at History and struggled with it in school. He felt the same way about Math. The two siblings were both smart, but had their own strengths and weaknesses. They may have looked quite similar, but their brains were rather different. As children, they had almost been indistinguishable from each other except for the fact that Sam was a boy and Sabrina was a girl. They were easier to tell apart now that they were older. The two had similar builds and features and they were the same height, but Sabrina's feminine (though not extremely curvy) figure compared to Sam's frame as well as their diverging personalities and styles made it much easier to tell who was who.

"I like your shirt, bro," Sabrina commented as she fished her History textbook out of her backpack.

Sam looked down at what he was wearing, specifically a pair of dark-colored jeans and a t-shirt of a rock band both he and his sister liked. He was thankful that while he and Sabrina's interests had developed down different paths as they'd grown up that they still had plenty in common, such as their taste in music.

"Yours is cool too," Sam said, noticing his sister was wearing a girls' cut t-shirt of another band they both liked. It was more form-fitting, tight across her stomach and her modest B-cup breasts, making the outline of her bra underneath semi-visible. The rest of her outfit consisted of a pair of very tight purple skinny jeans and a pair of white tennis shoes. Her dark hair, which was just short of shoulder-length like her brother's though more well taken car of, was pulled back into a ponytail off to one side.

"Thanks," Sabrina said, smiling before turning back to her studying.

Things soon fell silent. Their mother was away with some friends for a few days, so there wasn't much noise in the house. The silence didn't last too long though. Sabrina soon looked up at her brother with a cheeky smirk on her face. Sam knew it meant she'd had one of her ideas.

"What is it?" Sam asked.

"So, I was thinking," Sabrina said. "How about ..."

"Not what I meant, Sab," Sam said as his sister set her white tennis shoes and pink socks down in front of him.

"You know full well what I mean," Sam said. "We can't go to school like this."

"Sure we can," his sister replied. "Besides, we'll miss the bus if we take the time to swap back."

Sam sighed and reluctantly began putting on Sabrina's socks and shoes. "Everyone is going to laugh," he grumbled.

"Not if we pretend to be each other," Sabrina said, grinning as she stood up.

"Maybe we could have pulled something like that off when we were kids, but not now," Sam said as he finished putting on his sister's shoes. When they were little, the twins were basically identical apart from their gender, but their differences were much more obvious now, he thought.

"Come on, bro," Sabrina laughed. "Have you seen yourself?" She then proceeded too drag her twin brother in front of the mirror hanging in the hallway.

Sam knew he wasn't exactly the pinnacle of masculinity with his slender build and soft features, but he was surprised by what he saw in the mirror. With Sabrina's clothes on, he looked surprisingly like her. Maybe they were more identical than he realized. Looking back at his sister, he saw that she did look a lot like him while wearing his clothes. The lines blurred even further when Sabrina pulled out her hair tie then used it to put Sam's hair into a ponytail just like hers had been in. She then proceeded to miss up her hair to make herself look more like her brother.

"Okay so maybe we can pull this off," Sam admitted.

"Alright that settles it," Sabrina said. "We'll pretend to be each other today."

"Wait a second," Sam said, coming to realization. "This was your plan all along, wasn't it? So you could get out of taking the History test?"

"Maybe," Sabrina said with a devious smirk on her face.

"Fine," Sam said. "I'll take your test for you, but you owe me."

"Of course, bro," Sabrina said, patting Sam on the back. "The next time you have a difficult Math test we can switch places and I'll take it for you to return the favor. Deal?"

"Deal," Sam said and then the two shook on it.

"Now let's get going or we'll miss the bus!"

With that, the twins grabbed each other's backpacks and headed out the door.

152.title: Jenna

1521.content:
It was Friday evening and the woman's basketball team for Jenna's school, which she was a key part of, had won a big game against their rival school in the last match of the season. Jenna managed to score the winning points and was celebrated as a heroin among the team.

To celebrate their victory, the woman and men's basketball teams banded together to throw a big party in some old house they usually used for these purposes. Many people had brought some of their friends, some of them were managing drinks, others games and all the rest just got drunk while partying.

Jenna was at this party as well, though she came alone initially and banded with her teammates. She was currently wearing some black denim shorts with a cute pink tank top that showed off a bit of her cleavage. She had her sexy, strong legs fully visible in the tight shorts with her feet covered in some comfortable running shoes she usually wore out for a jog.

The party got off to a strong start, plenty of beer for the guys and plenty of wine for the girls, though some guys drank wine and some of the girls beer as well. Jenna was just talking with her friends while some guys occasionally tried to hit on her, which she quickly dismissed as most of them were just meatheads that couldn't tell her from her friends in their current state anyway.

Eventually however, some games started to be played, at first drinking games, but then dares started to become a part of it. Some of the girls had prepared some cards with several dares on them and the game was pretty simple. A player picks up a dare and decides to either do it, or take a shot of liquor as a punishment, which resulted in some hilarious situations. There were guys oinking like pigs and girls licking armpits and each time someone took a card and either did the dare, or drank a shot, they passed the turn, eventually giving Jenna a turn.

"Okay Jenna, your turn girl." One of the girls in charge of the game yelled at her. She was a petite Asian girl with short black hair, she was on the debate team but came along with her boyfriend.
"Sure, fine." Jenna said as she picked up a card as her face went pale as she read the card.
"What does it say!" The girl asked back as everyone watched in anticipation.
"Swap clothes with a person of the opposite gender." Jenna said as she showed the card.
"Pick someone!" The girl yelled excitedly as some of the boys around either looked away as if not to want to be picked, which surprisingly, some of the boys that hit on her were more than welcoming it.
"Uhhhm." Jenna said as she looked around the room.

After a few minutes of people staring at her, Jenna had made her decision.

15213.content:
Gazing around the room, Jenna's eyes fell upon a kind of nerdy looking boy looking on from the corner. She'd noticed him earlier, watching the game unfold but not participating himself. He looked about 5'8" and was very skinny for a guy, though it wasn't readily apparent due to his baggy t-shirt with a video game logo on it and baggy jeans. He also had messy blonde hair and didn't have much in the way of body hair (and the body hair he did have was barely visible due to its light blonde color). The reason she decided to pick him was because unlike most of the guys at the party, mostly jocks, she was taller than him and he was skinnier than her. This meant he wouldn't ruin her clothes by stretching them.

"You," Jenna said, pointing the boy out.

"Me?" he managed to get out, looking back at her with an expression of total surprise.

"Yeah you," Jenna said before standing up. Several of the girls nearby giggled as she approached the boy.

"O- okay," he said.

"What's your name anyway?" Jenna inquired.

"Uh, Alex," the boy said.

"So, Alex, are you going to switch clothes with me or what?" Jenna asked.
15213.title: Jenna swaps with a nerdy looking boy in the cor...

choices: A round passes and it comes back around to Jenna's turn
152132.content:
"Um, okay," Alex answered Jenna's question. He still seemed quite surprised by the whole thing.

"Good. Let's go." Jenna grabbed Alex by the arm and dragged him toward the bathroom before he could change his mind. Some of the girls giggled as the pair walked off.

"So, uh, why did you pick me?" Alex asked once they were in the bathroom.

"I don't want any of those jocks stretching out my clothes," Jenna explained. "But you're skinny enough that I shouldn't have that problem. I have to say, you're not the kind of guy I expected to see at a party like this."

"Oh, yeah, my friend Jeff dragged me here. His girlfriend is on the team," Alex explained.

"Jeff ... Jeff ..." Jenna muttered to herself as she tried to recall. "Oh, Megan's boyfriend?"

Alex nodded. "They ended up ditching me here too," he said, letting out a nervous laugh.

"Well I'll keep you company so I don't lose track of my clothes," Jenna teased. "After we swap you should come join the game."

"Alright," Alex agreed. "I guess we'd better swap then? So your friends don't think you're chickening out."

"Good point," Jenna laughed. "I like your shirt, by the way. Halo's pretty fun."

Alex looked down at his black t-shirt which featured a design Master Chief's helmet from Halo. "I didn't think a girl like you would like games," he said.

"Yeah I get that a lot," Jenna said. "But I have three older brothers. I grew up playing games with them."

"Oh, that's cool," Alex said.

"Anyway, let's do this thing."

Standing facing away from each other, the two removed their clothes and handed them off to each other. Jenna made sure Alex didn't steal any glances at her naked body, but he was well behaved unlike how she expected the meathead jocks at the party to have been in this situation.

Moments later, Jenna slid on Alex's boxers and jeans, then put on his shirt, his socks, and his sneakers. Alex, meanwhile, had managed to get on Jenna's panties and denim shorts, but he struggled with her bra.

"You've never been with a girl, have you?" Jenna laughed as she assisted him with the bra.

"Uh, no," Alex said, sounding somewhat dejected.

"Don't worry, I'm sure you'll find someone for you," Jenna assured him as he pulled her pink tank top over his head.

"I feel ridiculous," Alex said once he'd put on Jenna's shoes, which seemed to fit him just fine.

"My clothes look good on you," Jenna giggled. "Now, come on, let's get back to the game."

The pair made their way back to the game where they were greeted with laughs, though some of the guys seemed disappointed that Jenna was now wearing less revealing clothing. Thankfully for Alex, most everyone was too drunk to give him too much crap for wearing Jenna's clothes.

Once things settled down, Jenna took her spot on the couch and Alex sat down next to her, meaning it was now his turn. His dare ended up not being too horrible, only to take a shot of hot sauce. Jenna was impressed that Alex took it like a champ, downing the hot sauce like it was nothing, much to the disappointment of the jocks who would've liked to see a guy like him barf it up.
152132.title: Jenna takes Alex to the bathroom to swap

1521322.content:
Before long, a full round had passed. The dares hadn't been too interesting, and some players had even opted to just take a shot instead. The round had been quick, and it had come back around to Jenna's turn. Not thinking it could be worse than her previous dare, Jenna drew her card to see what her next dare would be.

"Make out with a player sitting next to you for one minute," Jenna read the card to the group. Of course it had to be another ridiculous dare.

"Oooh," one of the girls giggled with excitement. Jenna just rolled her eyes.

Jenna looked to her right. The guy sitting beside her in that direction, one of the guys on the men's basketball team, was totally drunk and he looked like a dumbass with his girlfriend's panties on his head as per his most recent dare. He made a gross kissy face back at Jenna as she looked him over.

Gross, Jenna thought, making a disgusted face.

Jenna looked to her right. Alex was sitting on that side. He seemed a bit more relaxed now after impressing on his dare. He really wasn't bad looking, if a bit out of place at the party. At worst, the inside of his mouth would taste like the hot sauce he had to chug for his dare. He was also still wearing her clothes. They really did look good on him, especially the way the tight denim shorts clung to his hips and showed off his skinny legs, which looked good on display, his light blonde hair making it look like he had smooth legs. Something about the thought of making out with a boy wearing her clothes while wearing his clothes was kind of appearing to her for some reason. Maybe that was the alcohol talking.

Thinking it over, Jenna glanced at the shots lined up on the table. She could always take a shot. After a few moments, she made up her mind.

15213222.content:
Jenna rolled her eyes at the Jock, who seemed more than confident she would choose him and quickly turned to her right. Alex seemed a bit caught off guard, he simple looked at her as if asking if she was really choosing him.
Jenna nodded and quickly moved in to start making out with the nerdy boy wearing her clothes.

"Don't worry, I'll show you how to kiss." Jenna whispered as she locked lips with Alex and started making out with him. It was a bit unexpected, but she started to really enjoy their kiss. She could taste the hot sauce on his lips but it only made the kiss feel that much more hot (literally). Jenna's heart was pounding, she hadn't felt like this anytime other than when she was running and reaching the peak of her run and feeling such a rush, it was the same with this boy.

As Jenna looked at Alex, she noticed a bulge inside the tight shorts, she couldn't help but feel excited at it. It was like they'd already shared a part of them, as if wearing his clothes had somehow made her feel more comfortable, his jeans, shirt and even his boxers felt so warm against her during the kiss, it swept her up in the moment.

A minute had already passed but they didn't really pay much attention, their kiss continued as both of them seemed to be very much fine with it. The kiss ended up being twice as long as the dare required and everyone just looked at them shocked. Some of the girls were laughing and some of the jocks looked to be extremely jealous.

152132222.content:
The game ended not long afterwards without much interesting coming forth from it anymore. The party started to die down and everyone started to leave. This also eventually included Jenna, who had been separated from her friends, and Alex.
"Hey, want to walk together for a little bit?" Jenna asked as Alex left the house as well.
"Sure, but don't you want to swap back clothes before we leave?" Alex asked.
"Not in the open and there's barely any free spots to change in the house now, some of the jocks are banging some of the girls and other stuff you'd rather not walk in on." Jenna said as she motioned for Alex to start walking with her.
"Fair enough, but I really would like to get my clothes back." Alex said slightly annoyed.
"But my clothes look so cute on you, you wear them well." Jenna said giggling.
"I'm not sure if that's a compliment." Alex said back nervously.
"Whenever we split up, we'll decide if we swap back." Jenna suggested.
"Okay fine." Alex responded as he pulled on the jean shorts and did his best to get used to them.

"Why did you decide to kiss me with that dare?" Alex asked nervously.
"Honestly, because I though you look cute in my outfit and swapping clothes with you, is a lot of fun." Jenna cautiously admits.
"Me in your shorts turns you on?" Alex chuckled.
"Not just that, also me in your clothes and you in mine even if it weren't shorts, it's just... fun, exciting, but it could also be the booze talking." Jenna giggled shrugging it off.

The rest of their walk they mostly talked about strange things they'd seen at the party or at other places, a bit about their hobbies and life and they were really enjoying their time together until they arrive at Jenna's home.
"This is where I live." Jenna said as she turned to Alex.
"I guess this is goodbye then, for now." Alex smiled back.
"We should probably swap back clothes though, unless you changed your mind?" Jenna giggled.
"....." Alex replied with a blush.

153.content:
Before we begin, here are a few more character descriptions for people in Terry's life:

Michelle (5'7" 46 years old): Terry's mother. While supportive of her son, she wishes he had applied himself more and hadn't dropped out. She's single as Terry's father was an asshole and is no longer in the picture. She's been in relationships since, but she's between boyfriends at the moment. She is generally laid back, but can be very assertive when she needs to be. She's still quite a looker and has a great figure and shoulder-length brown hair. Michelle works as a mid-level manager at an advertisement agency.

Sidney (5'9" 22 years old): Terry's co-worker at the convenience store where he works. She started working at there around the same time as Terry and she's just about the only one people there he can stand. They get along pretty well and enjoy chatting at work. Sidney is isn't that curvy and she's on the tall side for a girl, but she's cute and attractive. She has shoulder length blonde hair, usually pulled back into a ponytail, piercing blue eyes, and an infectious smile.

With that out of the way, how does our clothes swapping story start?

1531.content:
Terry sighed as he watched the latest rude customer at the convenience store he worked at demanding a refund without a receipt. Some people were impossible, and that was why Terry hated working the register. At least it was close to closing time and he would be home within the hour. "Only thirty minutes to go," he mumbled to himself as he glanced at his watch.

"Don't sound too excited," a familiar female voice said.

Terry glanced over to see Sidney, the co-worker who had the pleasure of closing with him tonight, leaning on the edge of the counter. Sidney was a 22 year old girl who started working at the store around the same time as Terry and she was just about the only one of his co-workers he could stand. Thought not the curviest girl, Sidney was super cute in that girl next store sort of way. She had shoulder length blonde hair, pulled back into a ponytail as usual, piercing blue eyes, an infectious smile, and at 5'9" she was actually on the tall side for a girl. Terry would be lying to himself if he said he didn't have a bit of a crush on her.

"It's not like Ms. bossy is around to hear me," Terry said, referring to the store's manager, Sheila. At this hour Terry and Sidney were the only employees left in the store.

"Fair enough," Sidney said with a laugh. "So, any plans tonight?"

Terry shrugged. "Not really. I was just gonna go home and play video games or something. You?"

"Me neither," Sidney said. "I can't be bothered to go out tonight."

"I know that feeling," Terry replied. "All the same, I can't wait to get out of here."

"Me too," Sidney said. "Let's hope no other customers show up and we can close on time for once."

"Let's hope so."

As it turned out, that ended up being the case. After switching the sign from open to closed, Terry followed Sidney to the staff locker room to change into his regular clothes. For some stupid reason, store uniforms weren't allowed to leave the store, so employees had to change before and after work and keep their uniforms in their lockers. It would have looked good clinging to Sidney's figure, but Terry felt ridiculous wearing it. The low-cut neckline even showed off a bit of his flat male chest. It would look much better on a girl with cleavage to show off. It also was a bit shorter than a male t-shirt. As he leaned down to grab his shoes, Terry could feel it exposing a bit of his lower back, and if he were to lean back, he had a feeling it would expose his navel.

As he put on his shoes, Terry glanced over at Sidney. She had since put on her tight jeans and they actually paired pretty well with his dark red t-shirt, which hung a bit loose on her. She looked really cute like that, especially once she put her small leather jacket on over it. As Sidney sat down to put her boots on, Terry stood up and put on his worn sports jacket.

"Lookin' good," Sidney teased. "Sure you want to cover up?"

"I'd rather not be seen like this," Terry said.

"Fine then," Sidney replied before sticking her tongue out at him.

"So, uh, what happens next in this game of yours?" Terry asked.

"Now we go home, silly," Sidney giggled.

"Like this? When will we swap back? Tomorrow?"

"Maybe," Sidney teased.

"Maybe?"

"If you follow the rules of the game."

"How can I follow the rules if you haven't told me what they are."

"We need to wear each other's shirts for a full day before we can trade again."

"I see..."

"Anyway, gotta run. I'll text you later."

With that, Sidney departed, leaving Terry to think over what had just happened.
153121.title: The gray low cut t-shirt.

choices: Terry checks out his new shirt.
1531212.content:
Terry arrived home without drawing too much attention, he managed to cover himself up pretty well and avoided walking too close to people. It still felt weird to weird Sidney's shirt however. As he took off his jacket, he caught a whiff of a strange but familiar smell. He took a moment to sniff his shirt and noticed a perfume, Sidney's to be specific. At least there was one upside to this.

Terry took a moment to grab a drink as he heard his phone receive a few text messages, checking them, they were from Sidney.
"Hey dude, thought I'd send you these messages with the rest of the rules for our little game."

"So this is what's up, whenever we swap a piece of clothing, we have to wear that the next day, no exceptions, but you knew that already. The thing is.... we can't swap them back, but you can wear your other clothes after that full day! But you won't get away playing it safe every day, because each day we will swap 1 additional piece, meaning we go from 1 to 2 to 3 etc. until we swap entire outfits every 2 days, due to us having to wear them a full day. Game ends when we have swapped everything, if one person runs out of clothes first, the other person will give that person all remaining clothes of their own they have and have to keep them for a little while before we can swap back out clothes, so you can have them back eventually! Oh and I always get to pick half the swaps we make and you the other half, if an odd number like today you get advantage at least!"

"I think that about covers it!"

As Terry read this he started to sweat, this was starting to get seriously embarrassing.
"And what if I don't agree with these rules?" Terry sent back.
"I'll share this picture " Sidney replied when sending a photo of him wearing her shirt in the dressing room.
"I'm not sure that's worse than actually doing this game." Terry sent back still skeptic.
"But I haven't even said what you get if you do participate."
"And that is?"
"I noticed you checking my out a couple times at work, soooooo if you do this with me ......"
"That is a pretty good motivation, fine, we'll try it out for a little bit, but I'm not saying I'll go the whole way yet." Terry said, unable to refuse that offer.
"It's a start! I'm liking your shirt and I already know what I want from you tomorrow "
"Enlighten me."
"I'm not spoiling the surprise, see you tomorrow!"
"See you!"

Terry needed a beer badly to digest this information, luckily that was exactly the drink he was getting earlier and he sat down on the couch relaxing the rest of the evening.
1531212.title: Terry arrives home

choices: Terry soon gets a text from Sidney
15312122.content:
After an otherwise uneventful night, Terry eventually drifted off to sleep. As he was once again working the late shift the next day, he didn't have an alarm set and slept in until late morning.

When he finally woke up, Terry was greeted with the faint lingering scent of Sidney's perfume. He was confused by the presence of the fragrance-- as well as the sensation of softer, tighter fabric against his skin-- for a few moments before he recalled the previous day's events.

"Oh right," he said to himself as he looked down at himself and saw that he was still wearing Sidney's shirt. He'd almost forgotten he'd agreed to his co-worker's silly game.

Once Terry crawled out of bed, he made his way downstairs to get some breakfast. His mother didn't appear to be home at the moment, which he was thankful for. He didn't really want to explain to her why he was wearing a girls' shirt. Thinking about it, though, Terry realized she was bound to notice his wardrobe slowly being replaced if he continued playing Sidney's swapping game.

"Man, I really need to move out," Terry grumbled to himself as he put a couple slices of bread into the toaster.
15312122.title: The following morning.

choices: Terry spots his mom coming into the store.
Sidney and Terry are being called into the managers office.
153121221.content:
As Terry contemplated his living situation, he got a text from Sidney as he quickly checked his phone.
"Don't forget you'll need to wear my shirt today! "
"How could I? I woke up to the smell of your perfume." Terry texted back as he started getting ready to leave.
"I bet you like that smell don't you? " She texted back quickly.
"Can't deny that, honestly, but I was more worried about my mom catching me than anything else."

"Oh right, forgot you still lived with your mom."
"It's a bit of a pain, I really need to move out soon, especially if I am going to be trading clothes with you like this so often ."
"I may have a way to help you somehow, but let's talk about it at/after work, we're going to be late otherwise."
"Agreed, I am curious what you want from me this time, you said you already knew."
"I do and you will trade that with me soon enough, patience is a virtue "
"See you at work in that case."
"Looking forward to after work more haha"

After this little chat, Terry went on his way to work, doing his best not to think too much about the shirt he was wearing or the swaps that were going to take place after work, but the smell was taking him back into it and he actually started to enjoy smelling Sidney's perfume.

As he arrived at work he waved over to Sidney as he sat down with her as they were both getting ready just before work, Sidney had already changed into her work clothes so he couldn't tell what outfit she chose to wear today, but he wouldn't be surprised if it was similar or even the same outfit as she wore yesterday.
They didn't get time to talk as they were being called into the store for the opening.
153121221.title: Terry soon gets a text from Sidney

choices: Terry picks socks, Sidney picks jeans
Terry picks jackets, Sidney picks underwear
Terry picks shoes, Sidney picks jackets
Terry picks jeans, Sidney picks underwear
1531212211.content:
The day at work proved to be another uneventful one, and before Terry knew it, it was late evening and he and Sidney were the last two working like yesterday. The two of them were on the closing shift for the foreseeable future, not that Terry particularly minded.

The two of them passed the time by chatting, and soon enough it was time to close up. Once they were done with that, the time finally came for their next swap. Aside from a clean pair of boxers and Sidney's shirt, the outfit Terry had worn today was more or less the same as the day before. Sidney's was pretty similar too. She'd worn a different pair of equally tight skinny jeans, but a slightly different shade of blue, but she wore the same boots and jacket.

"So, let's put all our clothes up as options this time," Sidney said before they got changed.

"What do you mean?" Terry asked.

"Well we didn't include our socks or underwear last time."

"Underwear, really?"

"What are you chicken?"

Terry rolled his eyes. "No."

"Then let's do this," Sidney giggled. "Remember we both get to pick something to swap this time."

"I know," Terry said.

"So what are we gonna swap?"
1531212211.title: After another uneventful work day.

choices: "I have a spare room you could take, I'm not using it anyway."
"If we both chip in, maybe we can start looking for a place together?"
"I know an affordable place a friend of mine is putting up for rent."
15312122111.content:
"I'll take your socks then, actually ends up being the easiest thing for me to take." Terry smiled as he peeled off his own black socks as Sidney did the same with her shorter white ones.
After throwing his socks to Sidney he was about to walk back over to his clothes but Sidney stopped him.
"Not so fast there, I get to choose something too this time." Sidney reminded Terry, his heart dropped as he realized she did say that before and wasn't lying.

Sidney put on Terry's socks, a bit sweaty from his work day and the same could be said for Terry with Sidney's socks, though neither of them seemed to mind that much. For Sidney, this was mostly due to her being focused on something else. She walked over to Terry's clothes he laid down and looked over her options.
"Don't drag this out, I know you want my underwear." Terry sighed he got ready to cover himself.
"Your underwear is safe this time, I actually have something else in mind." Sidney grinned as she grabbed Terry's jeans and laid them with her own clothes, followed by grabbing her own skinny jeans and placing them with the rest of Terry's clothes.

"That, could be worse honestly." Terry said swallowing his pride and walked over to the bundle of clothes still left.
"It won't be that bad, you'll look great in them." Sidney teased as she quickly pulled on Terry's shirt, which she still possessed followed by pulling on his comfortable acid washed denim jeans. Sidney looked to be really happy with this trade, she felt the pockets and moved around a bit, slowly falling away in thought as she mindlessly put on her shoes and jacket.

Terry on the other hand, wasn't as excited to try his newly acquired jeans, so he started with the shirt he was already used to and still faintly smelled Sidney's scent, which helped him a bit. However after this it really was time to pull on the jeans, which took a bit of struggling, even though she was slightly taller, her legs overall were a bit more slender apart from her hips which were just about on par with his. Sidney eventually snapped out of thought and helped Terry get into her skinny jeans, which once she did, went smoothly. Terry didn't stop to admire his new outfit until he had put on his shoes and jacket as well, but once he did, the realization struck him. He was wearing Sidney's tight skinny jeans, but he kinda liked it. The shirt he shrugged off before because it was just a shirt, but the fit of the jeans were so different, but he enjoyed the tight feeling of the denim against his legs.

"You have really nice legs Terry, my jeans look so hot on you." Sidney said as she did a circle around him.
"You look good in mine too." Terry said slightly blushing, embarrassed, but uncomfortably comfortable.
"Are you enjoying them?" Sidney then asked, met by a pause from Terry. "That's a yes then?" Sidney then grinned as she stood in front of him, inspecting him closer.
"What no! I mean, maybe a little, I don't know." Terry said panicking.
"Don't worry, they're just jeans." Sidney giggled.
"Not just jeans, your jeans, girl's jeans." Terry said back nervously.
"And they fit you, look good and are yours now anyway." Sidney giggled further as Terry just looked away uncomfortably.

"Anyway, there was something else I wanted to talk to you about, you said you were starting to feel a real need to move out?" Sidney changed the subject.
"Yeah, if my mom catches me like this, slowly trading every piece of clothing with you, I don't know how in the world to explain it and I can't really do anything of my own, it really sucks." Terry explained as he already shuddered at the thought of him mom asking him why in the world he was wearing woman's skinny jeans.
"I may have a solution, if you want it." Sidney continued.
"Any ideas are welcome." Terry replied a bit hopeful.
"Well, I was thinking......" Sidney then suggested.
15312122111.title: Terry picks socks, Sidney picks jeans

choices: "I could always move in with you and your mother
153121221114.content: "Well I was thinking that maybe it would be best to tell your mother about our little game since you cannot afford to rent out a place right now and I already have a room mate and she isn't moving anytime soon, that way your mother won't really quesion why you are wearing my clothes" Sidney suggested
