153121221115.content:
"Well a friend of mine is looking for a room mate I could put in a good word for you and maybe she will allow you to stay in her spare room but don't cheat on me by swapping clothes with her" Sidney said playfully teasing him at the end and winking at him suggestively "Or you can move in with our boss I heard there is a spare room there"

What does Terry do?
153121221115.title: Reader's choice.

choices: "I'll trade pants, but I can't trade my shirt, it's my work shirt.
"I appreciate the offer, but I'm not really comfortable doing that"
1532.content:
Terry finally had a day off after a long week of his boring job. He managed to get through to it thanks to Sidney being put on the same days as him for the most part and since he got along with her it wasn't as bad as it could have been.

His mother was on a business trip for a few weeks so she wasn't around, some kind of training camp she had to attend to at the other side of the country but he enjoyed being home along for a little bit. It was however already a mess after a few days and really needed to clean up his laundry and such soon but he put it off for now since he still had some clean clothes on, existing out of some denim jeans and a t-shirt which was one of the few that didn't have stains on it right now.

He decided to order a pizza today, he wasn't really in a mood to cook, the fridge was starting to look a bit empty as well and since it was raining immensely outside, he didn't really feel like going through it to get to the store.

A little while later, his doorbell rang. He opened up to see a girl standing there with a single pizza box. She was the delivery girl obviously and was wearing some black skinny jeans and a red t-shirt with a small jacket. She was completely drenched and looked to be exhausted.

"Did you order a pizza sir?" She asked.
"I did, thank you." Terry said. "You look completely drenched, are you okay?" Terry then asked feeling a bit bad for her.
"I am, this was my last delivery and the rain is letting up." She said trying to sound hopeful.
"Would you mind if I asked your name?" Terry asked.
"Michelle." She said.
"I'm Terry." He said back.

"You've got to be cold, can I offer you anything?" Terry asked feeling guilty about letting this girl trudge the rain because he couldn't be bothered to himself and knows the struggle of working a job that sucks to do.
"That's really kind but you really don't have to." Michelle said, appreciating his offer.
"Please, let me help you at least in some way, however there isn't a lot I could do, I really want to offer you a change of clothes but I'm afraid I don't really know if I have any spare clothes lying around, but I could offer you the ones I'm wearing?" Terry offered.
"..." Michelle responded.
1532.title: Scenario 2

choices: Terry realizes Michelle swapped something else with him while he was changing.
Terry's co-worker Sidney is at the door.
Terry finds something in Michelle's jean pocket.
15321.content:
"Thank you, I'd appreciate that." Michelle smiled.
"I will quickly get out of these, grab a towel and leave my clothes for you. In the meantime, if you want a slice of pizza feel free." Terry smiled as he quickly grabbed a piece of paper.
"Since you're so kind. I do have one question however, I don't really have a way to easily bring my clothes with me, would you mind if I left them here for now and I can pick them up later?" Michelle asked.
"I kind of already assumed that, because I thought since I have nothing else to wear, we'd trade clothes for now." Terry says a bit nervous while blushing.
"Yeah, me too, just wanted to confirm." Michelle smiles back.
"I'll quickly get undressed so you can get out of those as soon as possible." Terry says as he enters the bathroom.

It didn't take long for him to take off his shoes, socks, jeans and shirt. He didn't want to waste any time after all. As he did however, he looked down at his underwear and an idea hit him. He initially took the piece of paper to write his phone number, which he still did, but now he also wrote a second not which he laid on top of his boxers, leaving him completely naked.
The note said: "If you want?"

He grabbed a towel and left the bathroom. Michelle just finished eating a slice of her pizza and smiled as she quickly ran into the bathroom to get changed. Terry said down and ate some pizza before it turned cold as well. Terry was hungry so he comped down on his pizza quickly. Michelle ate a few slices but not too much and it was enough for him to satisfied.

As he chomped down on one of the last slices, Michelle walked out of the bathroom. She was now completely dressed in Craig's clothes and they fit her decently well. Terry was a pretty skinny guy so his clothes weren't too ill fitting on her.
"I left mine in there for you." Michelle smiled as she grabbed her things.
"If you got time after whatever it is that you need to do now, give me a call." Terry smiled.
"Sure, I got your number." She smiled as she closed the door behind her.

Terry finished his last slice as he went into the bathroom to get changed. He checked the notes he left first, which she added to.
Below his own phone number, Michelle wrote hers and on the note that he left on top of his underwear he saw she added: "Disgusting, but I like it!".

Terry smiled as he looked over the pile of clothes Michelle left him. He could see her black skinny jeans, red t-shirt and even her jacket as well as her black simple underwear. He saw her sneakers and socks in the corner as well.
Terry was still a bit unsure about it all but he started by grabbing the black panties and slid them on. They stretched enough to fit comfortably, if he was a girl, but they did put a bit of stress on his balls and his butt. Then he put on the bra and after fiddling for a little bit, he manged to put them on. They were a bit of a tight fit around his chest, but it kind of worked.

Next, he grabbed Michelle's skinny jeans and stepped into them. They were definitely a size too small. It took a few tugs but he managed to squeeze his male legs inside and button up the jeans, even though he wasn't entirely comfortable, it was kind of kinky to him and that only made it tighter, but he kind of liked it.

Terry then slipped on her t-shirt and left her jacket to the side for new, since he didn't feel like he should wear it inside but her shirt fit almost perfectly, which was nice. Her socks were fine but her shoes were once again a size or two too small. He could kind of force his feet in without damaging himself or the shoes too much but it wasn't entirely comfortable so he left those off for now as well.

The clothes were still a bit damp but he thought they'd dry as he wore them so he ignored it for now, not worried about getting a cold and finished his pizza.
15321.title: "Thank you, I'd appreciate that."

154.content: How does our clothes swapping story start?
154.title: Evelyn

choices: an athletic 25 year old surfer dude.
1541.content:
Evelyn was giddy with excitement as she stepped off the ferry onto the dock. She'd been saving up paychecks at her boring office job for months in order to embark on her latest adventure: a week long vacation on Flamingo Island, an exclusive tropical island resort. This was no typical resort however. Everyone staying for the week would be doing so in the role of someone else. Yes, each guest staying for the week was to be paired up with another guest at random and they would swap lives for the duration of their stay. What did that entail? They would be treated as each other, wear each other's clothes, experience activities their partners typically enjoyed, and more. It was going to be an interesting week for sure.

Stepping out into the sun, Evelyn paused to push her designer sunglasses down over her vibrant green eyes. She then adjusted her bra strap out underneath her red tank top, straightened out her mid-thigh length white skirt, then brushed her beautiful auburn hair back out of her face before continuing on her way. Pulling her suitcase along with her, Evelyn soon arrived at resort's hotel, where she was greeted by a cheerful young woman behind the desk.

"Welcome to Flamingo Island Resort," the woman said, a warm smile on her face.

"Hello!" Evelyn replied cheerfully. "I'm here to check in."

"Of course. Let's get you taken care of."

A few minutes later, Evelyn was waiting in a room to meet her partner. Before heading to the rooms they booked, the guests at Flamingo Island were brought to private rooms to meet their partners so they could swap clothes, suitcases, IDs, and everything else they were trading for the week as well as learn a bit about each other in order to better get settled into each other's lives.

Soon enough, Evelyn got to meet her partner. They were ...
1541.title: Scenario 1

choices: Let's get comfortable talking with each other first.
We need to start getting used to each other's clothes first.
I'm going to talk to the desk to see if they made a mistake.
15411.content:
The door to the private room Evelyn was staying in opened up and an 18 year old boy entered the room.
"Are you Evelyn?" The boy asked a bit quietly.
"I am, are you my partner?" Evelyn asked while smiling at him, trying to make him comfortable. The boy nodded as he slowly walked towards her.

The boy was awkwardly walking over to sit next to her as Evelyn checked out her partner. He was a bit awkward looking in terms of reactions, but he didn't look too bad. The boy had bright blond hair, which was a bit messy and on the short side.
He was dressed for the island's hotter climate as he was wearing a pair of brown khaki long shorts, showing off a bit of his hairy legs with some hiking boots at his feet. He was also wearing a white t-shirt with some brand's logo on it which Evelyn didn't recognize.

The boy was also kind of on the skinny side, but not as much as she expected to pair with his awkwardness. His legs showed a bit of muscle, though not that much as they were still skinny and hairy, making any muscle he did have only minimally visible.
His arms looked a bit more well trained as their muscle was a bit more apparent, though covered by arm hair.
Lastly, he had quite a soft face, it was completely devoid of facial hair and had bright blue eyes staring at her as he finally reached her.

"So uhhm, we seem to have been paired up together." The boy said awkwardly as he was slightly shaking as he sat down next to Evelyn.
"Are you nervous?" Evelyn asked as she sat closer to him.
"No, of course not." The boy replied trying to sound proud, but failing hilariously.
"Well, I am, I wasn't expecting to be swapping with a boy, but we do seem to be the same height, and possibly close to the same size, so I understand why they would pair us up." Evelyn started as the boy looked at her while slightly calming down.

"You really are nervous?" He asked softly.
"Yes of course I am, it's a big change, but I'm also excited." Evelyn admitted.
"What do you mean?" The boy asked curiously.
"I'll be living your life being treated as you, this is going to be scary, but amazing." She said smiling, causing the boy to start to warm up to her a little. "Oh how rude, I never introduced myself properly. I am Evelyn and I'm a 30 year old grown woman." She finally said as she extended her hand.
"I'm Kevin, 18 years old." He said as he shook Evelyn's hand.

Evelyn spotted Kevin checking her out as well, but in this particular case, she didn't feel like it was a bad thing. She paid close attention to his reactions and could tell he was feeling very nervous about swapping with her. She wasn't wearing very masculine clothes and there was a considerable age difference, so she could understand his nervousness. Come to think of it, most of the clothes she packed were booty shorts, dresses, skirts, etc. She brought girly clothes that showed off a lot of her body due to the climate, she wasn't expecting a boy to wear them after all.

"So what do you want to start with?" Kevin then asked as he looked over at Evelyn.
"....." Evelyn said
15411.title: an awkward 18 year old boy.

choices: "Mind if I check out out my new suitcase?"
"What kind of activities did you have planned here?"
"Should just hop into our new lives?"
154112.content:
"I'll be wearing your clothes anyway." Kevin said as he nervously fidgeted.
"let's get to it then." Evelyn said as she took off her red tank top and laid it down.
"Are you sure you don't want to cover ourselves somehow?" Kevin said nervously.
"There's not really any way to do that right now, just hurry op and give me your shirt." Evelyn said and Kevin complied and took off his t-shirt and gave it to the woman in front of him. Evelyn put on Kevin's shirt and then took off her bra underneath it and gave it and her tank top to Kevin.
"Could you help me put this on?" Kevin asked as he pointed to the bra and Evelyn nodded. She put her bra around Kevin's chest and he put on the red tank top, adjusting the straps a bit to make them not as painful.

Next Evelyn kicks off her sandals, takes her mid thigh skirt and pulls it down, revealing her panties, causing Kevin to blush madly.
"Stop staring at them and put them on." Evelyn giggled as she took off her panties and gave them to Kevin along with her skirt.
Kevin follows, taking off his hiking boots, shorts and boxers and quickly squeezed himself into Evelyn's panties. Once he comfortably put it on, he put on the white skirt as well as the sandals and adjusted all of it a little to be comfortable. Evelyn in the meantime grabbed Kevin's boxers and shorts and pulled them on as well as his boots and admired her outfit.

"We look quite good swapped like this." Evelyn said as she found Kevin's clothes rather comfortable.
"It will take some getting used to." Kevin said, seemingly livening up a little, but still embarrassed to death.
"Oh, one more thing!" Evelyn said as she took off her designer sunglasses and put them on Kevin's face.
"Never thought I'd do this honestly." Kevin said.
"Me neither, but you look good." Evelyn said trying to comfort him. "Are they comfortable?"
"They are." Kevin said.
"Then don't worry, as far as the resort is concerned, you're Evelyn, a 30 year old woman.
"That's fair." Keven smiled as he got used to wearing a skirt.

"So what do we do now?" Kevin asked.
"...." Evelyn suggested.
154112.title: We need to start getting used to each other'...

choices: It's time to part ways for now
The two get to know each other a bit more
1541122.content:
"What kind of activities did you have planned here?" Evelyn inquired, shifting in her seat slightly as she got used to her new outfit.

As part of booking a stay at this resort, guests had been required to sign up for activities, or more specifically, sign up whoever they were to swap with for activities that would give them a taste of what their life and interests were like. After swapping guests weren't required to do all or even any of the activities they were signed up for, but they were encouraged to do so to get the full experience. Evelyn decided it was a good idea for her and Kevin to discuss what they had signed each other up for now that they had swapped clothes.

"Oh, beach time mostly," Kevin answered. "I was thinking I'd come here to relax so someone swapping lives with me should relax on the beach like I would do. I did sign up for some other things though. The jungle adventure sounded interesting, so I guess you'll be the one to find out what that is."

"I guess I will," Evelyn laughed. "As for you, you'll get to enjoy the full salon and spa experience I signed up for. And relaxing in the sun, of course."

"Oh boy," Kevin said somewhat sarcastically.

"It'll be tons of fun!" Evelyn teased. "A nice makeover and spa treatment, and you'll be rocking my outfits."

"You think so?" Kevin asked nervously.

"Of course," Evelyn grinned.

15411221.title: Who do we follow

155.content:
Jennifer (5'4" 38 years old): A single mother with four teenage children that can be quite the handful. She became a mother at the age of 20 and the father of her children is no longer in the picture. She's generally a cool mom, but is strict when she needs to be. Sometimes her kids can be a lot to deal with and can try her patience, but she does care for them and has their best interests at heart. She's still quite good looking with wavy blonde hair and a decent figure and she tries to keep up with the latest fashions when she can.

Melissa (5'6" 40 years old): A couples and family counselor who uses unorthodox methods. One of her favorite methods is to have her patients wear each other's clothes to better understand each other and sometimes has them trade lives. Another method she sometimes uses is hypnotism to alter how her patients behave. Sometimes she will even use both methods together to get patients to swap clothes and/or lives if they are unwilling to try. She's a somewhat stylish woman with dark brown hair and designer glasses and maintains a professional appearance at work.

Chris (5'7" 19 years old): A somewhat nerdy college guy who enjoys video games, tabletop roleplaying games, and other nerdy pursuits. He's a bit shy and has some trouble bonding with people as a result, but he's looking to break out of his shell and make new friends who share his interests. He's a bit on the skinny side and lacks any athletic ability, but he's still decently attractive. He has short light brown hair and sharp blue eyes.

Britney (5'7'' 21 years old): A girl who's into heavy metal music and believes in living in the moment. She likes to party and have a good time and has little patience for people she views as boring. As a result, she can be dismissive of most people outside of her friend groups. That said, she's a good friend and is very dependable. She's also quite attractive, has a great figure, and she has straight dark hair just past her shoulders. In terms of style, Britney generally wears tight-fitting pants and tops that show off her figure. She frequently wears tight jeans and leather pants and leather jackets, and from time to time skirts and other things that are a bit more feminine. She also has an affinity for boots and has many pairs in varying styles. She also plays the guitar.
155.title: More characters

1551.content:
Before we begin, here are a few more character descriptions for Jennifer's kids:

Vanessa (5'6" 18 years old): She's a preppy, popular cheerleader and loves attention. She's quick to lash out when she doesn't get her way and the first to make a scene if she thinks she'll get an advantage out of it. She loves to hang out with her friends and dress to look hot, which mostly involves anything revealing enough to show skin, even though her mother doesn't always agree. She has wavy blonde hair like her mother, cut to shoulder length, and a great figure.

Clarissa (5'7" 17 years old): Unlike her older sister, she hates to be around people in general and like to keep to herself. She can be kind of moody at times and is currently going through a goth phase. She shares some interests with her brother Quinton and actually gets along with him just fine, unless she's in a bad mood, in which case he can piss her off as much as anyone. She has long, straight black hair, wears heavy black eye makeup and dark colored clothes. She has a decent figure, but not as good as Vanessa's, not that she cares.

Quinton (5'5" 15 years old): The only boy in the family, and much like Clarissa he can moody at times and likes to keep to himself. He's into gaming and music and tries to avoid coming out his room when there's company as he hates being among lots of people. He has short black hair that gets wavy if it grows too long. He prefers a comfortable clothing style, but nothing with bright colors.

Julie (5'3" 14 years old) The youngest member of the family. She's a girly girl like Vanessa, though not as extreme. She loves bright colors, especially pink, and usually wears shorts, skirts, or skinny jeans and girly tops. She likes pretty much everything and, much to Clarissa and Quinton's annoyance, wants to hang out all the time. She gets annoyed when she doesn't get what she wants. She has long, straight blonde hair and her figure is still developing.

With that out of the way, how does our clothes swapping story start?
1551.title: Jennifer

15511.content:
It was a nice summer day Jennifer sat at home reading a good book, enjoying a nice breeze coming in through the open window as well as some rare peace and quiet. With four teenage children that often didn't get along, such calm in the house was hard to come by, especially in the summer when they weren't attending school every day. Jennifer always tried to make the most of these moments when she could.

That was what she was doing now, at least it was ... the sudden sound of shouting in another part of the house interrupted her reading. Jennifer sighed and put down her book. This was the fifth time this week her kids had gotten into an argument and she was, quite frankly, not in the mood.

First her oldest daughters Vanessa and Clarissa got into a petty argument. Then her son Quinton had called Vanessa a bitch after a disagreement and Vanessa, of course, made a scene. Just yesterday her youngest daughter Julie had got into separate arguments with Clarissa and Quinton. And now this.

Jennifer couldn't quite tell who was arguing from where she was in the house. She could make out the voices of Quinton and at least one of the girls, but she didn't know for sure which. Whatever the case, Jennifer had had enough this week. It was time to take drastic measures.

"Can't you kids get along?!" Jennifer demanded as she stormed into the room where the argument was happening, not bother to determine who was arguing with who. "If you can't learn to put yourselves in each other's shoes and come to an understanding, I'll have to make you!"

"But Mom, she--" Quinton started to say before Jennifer cut him off.

"I don't wanna hear it!" Jennifer shouted. "Enough is enough! You're not getting off easy this time! I've got a special punishment in store for you!"

Jennifer's kids looked back at her nervously. They hadn't seen their mother this mad before and were afraid of what punishment she might have in mind. Jennifer just shook her head. It was time for ___ to spend a little time in each other's shoes ... literally.

She was wearing her new black ankle boots and some of her white socks, which were the only thing that wasn't too sexy looking.

Vanessa in turn also looked over her brother.
Quinton was currently dressed like he usually would be, he was wearing some slim fitting dark gray jeans with his favorite red shirt of his favorite game. He was also wearing some gray boxers, white socks and black sneakers.

"Let's do this then I guess." Vanessa sighed as she slowly wiggled out of her skirt and laid it down on the cabinet next to her. Quinton quickly nodded and started taking off his jeans and shirt and laid them down next to Vanessa's skirt, which were also quickly followed by her tube top, socks, ankle boots and finally her sexy thong and push-up bra.
Quinton took off the rest of his clothes as well, laying down his socks, sneakers and boxers as well.

"Don't look at me until I get dressed." Vanessa said as she forced her brother to wait and look into a corner.

Vanessa then reluctantly got started and pulled on Quinton's gray boxers, fitting comfortably, but were definitely not her style. She then proceeded to pull on his jeans, which were on the snug side due to her being a bit taller and more mature, but again, weren't really her style. The shirt she kind of liked on the one hand as he pulled it on, she liked the fit, but hated the design as she took a deep sigh, annoyed at her situation. She finished off by putting on Quinton's socks and sneakers and tapped him on his back to signal she was done.

Intent to avoid pissing her off, Quinton simply nodded as he walked over to the pile of clothes left behind. He started by pulling on the thong, which was really uncomfortable to wear as he felt his privates be constricted beyond anything he had felt before. Luckily, when it came to the bra, Vanessa decided to help him out as she secured the bra on his chest.
Quinton then grabbed the skirt which felt way too short for him, filling him with all kinds of uncomfortable feelings as he managed to pull them up over his hips. Then he put on the light green tube top, which felt really weird for him to pull on as Vanessa decided to help him out a little with that one as well. Lastly, he pulled on the white socks and Vanessa's black boots as he wobbled a bit while practicing to walk.

The newly swapped siblings then reluctantly walked out of the bathroom where their mom was waiting for them and nodded approvingly as they came out.
"Good, now for the details of your punishment." She started "...."

155113131312.content:
"I'm mom now, so I guess I should act like her, do her jobs as quickly as possible so I can do anything I want afterwards." Quinton though to himself as he though living as his mom was going to be a cakewalk.
However as Quinton walked over to grab her checklist, which he knew she always kept in one of the kitchen drawers, it didn't seem too long. It read:
- Clean the house.
- Do the laundry.
- Do groceries.
- Prepare dinner.
These were things she almost always did, but as Quinton had no experience cleaning the house, only knew how to cook basic things that his mom taught him and didn't know at all how to do laundry, the reality set in.

He decided to start with cleaning the house and searched for the vacuum cleaner and the mop, which he found fairly quickly. Vacuuming wasn't very difficult, though he wasn't as perfectionist as him mom. The same could be said for mopping the floor.
Finally also realizing he needed to do some more cleaning by hand in the kitchen and make the beds in everyone's rooms, he got more and more respect for his mom as he did all of her daily tasks, being much more time intensive than he thought.

While making everyone's beds however he decided to also do the laundry and after reading the instructions managed to get the general idea of what to do.

15521.content:
Melissa smirked and pushed her glasses up bridge of her nose as she looked across the room at her current patient. He was a young man of age 20 by the name of Alex dealing with some depression issues. After talking with him for a bit, Melissa had determined that he would be a perfect candidate for her special treatment plan.

Over the previous few therapy sessions, Melissa had worked out with Alex the main issues that had led to his depression as well as some that were exacerbating it. A stressful college schedule and struggles to make friendships and romantic relationships had been the main causes, but Alex had picked up a few bad habits that certainly weren't helping. So far, Alex was having trouble breaking out of his funk he was in… Which was why Melissa was about to propose a different approach to treatment.

"I think I know what might help you," Melissa said. "You need an extra little push to help you kick those bad habits and I think hypnosis could help you."

"Hypnosis?" Alex asked incredulously.

"Yes, hypnosis," Melissa replied. "I can put you in a hypnotic trance where I can plant suggestions that will give you a subtle aversion to doing the things you're trying to stop doing."

"That can work? I thought that was just stuff made up for movies and TV."

"Yes, well, it doesn't work quite like they make you believe in pop culture, but it does help."

That was of the entire truth, of course. Melissa had figured out a way to hypnotize people just like in pop culture. She was going to help Alex to kick his bad habits with hypnosis, but she had a little extra something in mind. She felt that his relationship issues stem from not understanding women well enough, and she had a little plant to help him with that.

"Let's try it," Alex said."At this point, I'm ready to try anything."

"Perfect!" Melissa said. "Let's begin."

Soon, Melissa had her patient in a hypnotic state, and she planted the suggestions that would remove his bad habits. Now it was time for the extra suggestion. Alex, of course, wouldn't remember anything that happened in this state he was in, so he would be unaware of the extra suggestion.

A smile on her face, Melissa planted the suggestion in Alex's mind to…

"It's a bit embarrassing," Alex replied, blushing slightly. "But it feels right somehow."

"I see," Melissa said. It seemed her hypnotic suggestion had taken well enough. That was good. "Well, in that case, keep the outfit."

"Wait, are you sure?" Alex asked.

Melissa smiled. "Of course. Swapping with you seems to have helped. With my salary I can afford to lose an outfit. Besides I have one just like that already."

"I don't know what to say," Alex said. "Thank you."

"Helping you is my job after all," Melissa laughed. "Anyway, I think we'll leave it here today. Let's set up our next session for a few days to check in. You can set that up with my secretary on the way out."

"Okay, see you then," Alex said before standing up.

"Bye now. Have a great day," Melissa said, smirking as she watched her patient depart, teetering slightly on her former heels.

Once Alex was gone, Melissa couldn't help but rub between her legs through her new clothes. She would have been lying if she said that her methods didn't turn her on a bit. Though Alex believed this had all been his own idea, Melissa was no stranger to such occurrences. This wasn't the first time she'd swapped clothes with a patient and it likely wouldn't be the last.

Melissa's staff didn't notice anything odd either. That was because she'd hypnotized them into not finding it odd that her patients swapped clothes at her therapy sessions. They wouldn't find it strange that she was now wearing Alex's clothes either.

Today had been a great success. Melissa was looking forward to seeing how things progressed with Alex.

As he did the usual things, made breakfast, brushed his teeth etc. he noticed he was running low on food and drink, which meant it was time to go grocery shopping, as much as he didn't like doing so.

After grabbing his jacket and shoes, Alex made his way down the hallway toward the lobby of the building. As he arrived there, several people were scattered around, some sitting on the couch talking, while others were listening to music or reading by themselves. Particularly, a couple girls were among them.

Firstly, there was Jade, she was one of the nicest people Alex had met, she was about his age and dresses a bit girly from time to time, but today was dressed in some skinny jeans and a tank top as well as some ankle high boots. Her brown hair was pulled into a ponytail and she was talking to some guy on the couch.

Off in one of the corner chairs, sat a girl named Leah, she was a bit older than Alex. He didn't really know her much, other than she was a real daredevil. She had been traveling around a lot and is quite the adventurer. He had heard her talk about some of her travels to other people while passing by before but never really spoke. She had long blond hair and was currently wearing some kakhi shorts and a comfortable t-shirt as well as some hiking boots and a backpack to her side.

Next, on her way out as well, was the ever popular Amanda, a 16 year old popular girl. Alex didn't really like her, but she definitely thought he did, she thought everyone did. She was currently wearing some yoga pants showing off her nice butt as well as a crop top showing off a lot of her body and a pair of running shoes, with her red hair waving behind her.

Lastly, there was Mei, she was a bit of a geeky girl, loved to play video games and D&D. Though a lot of people thought she was a bit weird. Alex hadn't talked to her much, but she definitely had a bit of a crush on him, but afraid to ask him out. She was of Japanese origin and had short-ish black hair. She was wearing some really tight fitting black jeans and a warm sweater as well as some worn runners.

Alex didn't really pay much attention to look around as he was focused on heading out, regardless of this, as Alex walked through the lobby, he got a good look at ..... before reaching the door.

1552111221314.content:
As Alex spotted Mei from the corner in his eyes, that was all it took for Alex to be affected by the hypnosis.
Alex started to check out Mei, but not in his usual way. He started by looking at her sweater and all he could think about was how warm and comfortable it would feel, eying down the jeans made him imagine how the tight jeans would feel against his legs, moving further down he also wondered how the shoes would fit and how they would compare to his and lastly, even though he couldn't see it, he wondered what kind of underwear she was wearing, but wanted to wear them more than he wanted to see her in them.

As the desire to swap with Mei became stronger and stronger, he couldn't take it anymore and walked up to her.
"Hey, you're Mei right?" Alex said awkwardly.
"Hey, uhhm, yeah that's me." Mei said awkwardly blushing as Alex startled her.
"There is something I want to ask you, but it is a bit weird." Alex said stumbling on his words.
"What is it? People seem to think I am weird too." Mei responded, trying to decide if she should tell him of her feelings or not.
"I uhhm, kind of couldn't look away when I spotted you and uhhm, I kind of have this urge to want to uhhm, swap clothes." Alex said really softly, avoiding anyone else hearing him.

"Yeah weird is right." Mei said as she shut down her laptop.
"Sorry I shouldn't have asked." Alex said embarrassed as he wanted to walk away.
"But I did say I was also weird." Mei said grabbing his arm.
"Does that mean?" Alex asked.
"We'll do it, but only on one condition." Mei declared.
"Anything." Alex said.
"You become my boyfriend." Mei demanded.
"As long as we're swapping clothes, I'll do it for sure." Alex agreed.

Mei squealed with glee and dragged Alex upstairs, towards her room and got ready to swap clothes with her new boyfriend.
She went into her bathroom and shut the door, though not long after, she came back out with just a towel wrapped around her.
"Your new clothes are ready for you, babe." Mei said as she planted a kiss on Alex's lips.
"Alex didn't waste much time getting in however, seeing the pile of Mei's clothes on the sink waiting for him.
He locked the door and quickly stripped out of his own clothes, getting ready to try on Mei's clothes.

Firstly, he grabbed Mei's blue panties from the pile and pulled them on, quickly followed by the matching bra, which he was getting better at putting on.
Once his new underwear was secured, tightly, but comfortably, he moved on to grab Mei's jeans. The jeans were really tight, but after slowly pulling them on and struggling slightly with the zipper and button, he managed to put on Mei's jeans and he really enjoyed them, even though they were basically crushing his privates. Shifting focus to the sweater, Alex pulled the comfortable warm sweater over top his head and neatly covered the bra and even the top of the jeans, also covering his bulge.
Lastly, Alex grabbed Mei's runners and slipped them on, which were a size too small at least, but managed to squeeze his feet into them, though not extremely comfortably.

Alex admired his new outfit, really enjoying the feeling of the extremely tight jeans and soft sweater against his body.
Mei was waiting outside and blushed as she saw her boyfriend walk out out.
"You look really cute in my clothes." Mei blushed.
"Glad you think so, I love them, mine are waiting for you too in there." Alex smiled as he returned another kiss on Mei's lips and saw her enter the room, getting ready to change into his clothes.

Melissa has something else in mind
15522.content:
"Why don't you tell me what sort of problems you've been having?"

Melissa leaned back in her chair and crossed her legs as she looked across the room at her newest clients. Whitney, 29, and her husband Casey, 28, had recently come to Melissa for marriage counseling and today was their first session.

"Well our marriage has been rather strained lately," Whitney explained.

"That's an understatement," Casey said, eliciting an annoyed glance from his wife.

"Anyway," Whitney continued. "We're both still committed to working things out ... we just need a bit of help."

Melissa smiled. "Well you've come to the right woman. Now, how about you tell me a bit about yourselves?"

---


Many minutes later, Melissa had a clear picture of her new clients. Both Whitney and Casey were college educated with so far successful business careers. However, those careers meant they didn't have much time for each other. Melissa suspected that's was the source of tension in their relationship, but there wasn't a simple fix for it.

Melissa looked over at Whitney. She was a relatively attractive blonde currently wearing a stylish floral-print blouse, a pair of skinny-fit jeans that complimented her decent figure, and a pair of black boots with a 2-inch heel. Casey wasn't bad looking either. Looking him over, Melissa determined he was a decently handsome dark-haired man. His outfit consisted of a red button-down shirt, a pair of comfy black jeans, and a pair of work boots.

"It seems to me that you two simply need to find more common ground with each other, discover more mutual interests, and make the most of your time together," Melissa finally addressed her clients. "With your busy careers you aren't spending enough time together. You both want to do that, but you also want to explore your own interests as well. The problem is neither of you is putting enough effort into understanding the other's interests. That's where I come in. I think I have just the treatment plan in mind."
15522.title: Scenario 2

choices: The couple exchanges their phones and wallets next.
The couple decide to take care of the rest later and head home
Melissa introduces another couple that had swapped lives before.
155222.content:
"Why don't we try a life-swapping exercise? I have done this with several of my patients and they tell me it's helped them become much closer and more understanding towards each other, is that something you would be open to?" Melissa suggested.
"What would all of that include?" Casey asked as he and Whitney listened seemingly interested.
"It would include working each other's jobs, doing each other's tasks and swapping all your possessions like phones, passports and clothes." Melissa summarized as she got up from her chair.

"This has helped people before?" Casey asked skeptically
"We'll do it." Whitney then chipped in as she got a confused look from her husband.
"Do I get any say in this?" Casey shot at his wife as they both started to frown.
"It's something we can try, it will help us understand each other better at least, come on, if you still love me, do this for me." Whitney said as she grabbed Casey's hand.
"Of course I love you. Okay, let's do it." Casey admitted as he laid his other hand on top of Whitney's and gave her a warm smile.

"Then how about we take 5 minutes for you two to swap clothes, I'll go outside and lock the door to give you some privacy as well as close the curtains." Melissa said as she straightened her skirt.
"Right now? Uhhm okay." Whitney said as Casey nodded. Melissa left the room and locked it as she suggested and takes a small lunch break.

"I'm still a bit unsure about this." Casey said as he took off his jeans and shirt.
"Oh come on, we can at least try, besides, you'd look cute in my outfit." Whitney winked as she wiggled out of her skinny jeans.
"It's not your reaction I'm worried about." Casey said as he took off his boots, leaving him in his underwear.
"It will be fine babe, if they act like asses, just ignore them." Whitney winked as she took off her blouse and boots, also leaving her in her underwear.
"I'm still skeptical." Casey said, but seemingly a bit more calm. "Let's get started." He continued but Whitney quickly stopped him.
"Not so fast cowboy, you're wearing MY underwear." Whitney giggled as unhooked her bra.
"Is that really necessary?" Casey asked as Whitney nodded.
"They're part of our clothes aren't they?" She said as she took off her panties as well
"Please forgive me fair lady." Casey joked as he reluctantly took off his boxers.

Casey took a deep breath as he took the panties from his wife and stepped into them, though he manged to pull on the tight panties, they did make him feel excited in that area, causing a certain constriction. Whitney pulled on his boxers in the meantime and helped him put on the bra afterwards, which he obviously needed help with. Next, while Whitney pulled on Casey's comfortable black jeans, he squeezed himself into his wife's skinny jeans, which gave him a small amount of issue. It took a few good tugs to pull them up far enough and some flexibility to button them up and close the zipper as his harder member was getting in the way a bit. Moving on, Casey dressed himself in Whitney's flora-print blouse, while she dressed in his red button-down shirt. Their shirt sizes were fairly similar so they fit quite comfortably. They finished up with each other's boots, which were slightly different in two ways. For one, Whitney's boots fit quite snugly on Casey's feet while his were slightly more loose on her. Lastly, Whitley's boots had a 2 inch heel, so Casey now had to deal with learning to walk with them.

"You look cute." Whitney laughed as she looked as her husband.
"They're tight, mine look cute on you too though." Casey admitted as he adjusted the bulge inside the skinny jeans.
"I might have to suggest we keep these permanently." Whitley giggled as she walked around in her new outfit.
"I hope not!" Casey said with some fear in his voice.
"It was only a joke, maybe." Whitney winked as she put her hand on Casey's waist.
"This is an unusual, but really exciting experience at the very least." Casey admitted as he kissed his wife on the lips.
"We should have swapped clothes much sooner, this is amazing." Whitney laughed.
"I'm sure you're happy not having to deal with these tight jeans." Casey said as she pulled on them.
"Oh if you're already annoyed at that, I can't wait to see you wearing my suit." Whitney grinned as Casey's face went black as he though about his wife's skirt suit.

Not long after, Melissa walked back into the room and motioned for the couple to sit down.
"Everything go well?" She asked as the couple nodded.
"I'm enjoying this so far." Whitney smiled as Casey nodded softly.
"You okay Casey?" Melissa asked him.
"Just takes a bit of getting used to is all." He said as his wife comforted him by grabbing his hand.
"Sharing an experience like this will do you good, but this is only the start, next you will need to get used to each other's lives, or your new lives I should say."

1554.content:
Before we begin, here are a few more character descriptions for Britney's roommates:

Kim (5'4'' 21 years old): A fun-loving, laid back girl who's into rock music. She generally doesn't care what people think and just wants to do her own thing and live her life. She can be a bit of a flake sometimes, but will be there for her friends when she's needed. She's cute with a slender build and she has wavy shoulder length blonde hair. Kim's preferred clothing is whatever she finds comfortable, from jeans to skirts to band t-shirts to dresses, from more unisex tomboyish outfits to the very feminine. She also plays the bass guitar.

Nikki (5'5'' 21 years old): A rebellious girl with a chaotic personality who's into punk music. She has little patience for authority figures and "normal" people and she enjoys taking them down a peg when she can. She generally only associates with people she thinks are cool enough. Nikki has a very punky fashion sense, wearing ripped clothes and combat boots and the like. She has a decent figure but doesn't care much about showing it off. She has straight brown hair but she's always dying it different colors and trying different hairstyles. She also plays the drums.

With that out of the way, how does our trait swapping story start?

Due to her petite frame Lucy has to wear custom made clothes that gives the illusion of a more mature build. Lucy has shoulder length blonde hair that she usually wears in a ponytail when at home, Lucy primarily likes to wear pants but will wear skirts from time to time which is the opposite of Wendy who loves dresses. Despite her serious exterior Lucy has a fondness for harmless pranks mainly on Wendy who has been trying to get her back

On a calm quite Thrusday evening, after a simple and healthy meal Wendy helps her older sister with the dishes. It's a simple task that doesn't take too much time or effort. Both help each other clear the table then wash and dry dishes. Wendy, getting bored with the task, tries to sneak away before the dishes have been put away.

"I see you, you little sneak." Lucy says with a playful smirk. "If you are done with this task maybe you can help me with my next one."

Wendy's eyes go big with excitement. "Oh yeah?!" She questions with joy.

Lucy smiles and says, "yes you can help me..." she takes a minute to pause to let her sisters excitement build "....fold laundry!"

"Oh come on Lucy thats not fair! You really had me excited!" Wendy said beginning to pout.

"Well I don't know why. You know we have to do our chores before we play" Lucy leaves the kitchen and comes back with a huge bin of clean clothes. She dumps them out on the table. A combination of both their clothes now lay out over the entire top. "Besides we can make this fun."

"Fun? How's folding clothes supposed to be fun?" Wendy says looking at the large pile.

"How about I only fold yours and you only fold mine?" Lucy says holding up a pair of her sisters little girl panties.

Wendy looked over the pile and noticed there were way more of her things than Lucy's so she agreed. "Woah! This is pretty!" Wendy said holding up Lucy's purple satin nightie.

"Be careful with that. It's delicate." Lucy said as she was folding one of Wendy's little girl shirts. She laughed as she held it up and noticed how it could fit her perfectly.

"And these are so smooth!" Wendy laughed holding up a pair of light pink satin panties with lace trim.

"Yes yes, those are my big girl panties." Lucy said not being the least bit amused. The two continued on inspecting the others clothes and folded them neatly into piles. As expected, Wendy finished before her older sister and started to leave. "Hold on sneak!" Lucy said before she could leave. "Are you just going to leave those there? Put them away for me please while I finish yours. Then get ready for bed."

"....Ok...." Wendy said grabbing all of her sister's clothes with a wicked grin....

155533311.content:
It was another late night at work. Tim was working a late shift once again as was his secretary Lindsey. They were currently the only people still in the building and taking a small break in the break room a few floors down from their office.

"You sure you can work this late Lindsey?" Tim asked as he ate his meager meal.
"Yeah, you could use all the help you can get these days." Lindsey replied as she did the same.
"It's been kind of boring everywhere else anyway." Time laughed, trying to make light of the situation.
"Oh? How come?" Lindsey asked.
"Well, I have no real lover but even when I have to occasional interaction, it just starts to get stale." Tim complained.
"Have you tried role play?" Lindsey asked.
"I have but nothing really exciting has come up, it's just a bit too standard in most cases.

“Are they mental trying to organize something like this“ said Mike as he returned to the group to inform them of what caught all the girls attention

“Well what are they trying to organize?” asked Chris

“It says that the faculty is organizing a swap day” said mike while looking at Jimmy thinking how it could be that funny but started to chuckle to himself a little

“What the hell do they mean by swap day” asked the last member of the group

“Well James it appears that they are gonna make those who signed up to participate swap uniforms with someone of the opposite gender” said jimmy

“That cant be true” said James as he went to what they deemed to be a sign up sheet for the event to see if jimmy was telling the truth

“Is he telling the truth” asked mike knowing that jimmy had a tendency to lie through his teeth

“Yeah he is” said James

“This is fucking bullshit, but luckily for us we aren't being forced to participate” said chris

“Cmon we got to get to class and hand in these bs essays we had to write”

After entering class the teacher had everyone hand their essays in and proceeded to mark them while the class spent the time studying in silence, after class was over Chris, Jimmy, Mike and James were asked to stay behind

“Oh shit here we go” they all thougt

“Any idea as to why i asked you four to stay behind” asked the teacher

“No miss we have no idea” said chris knowing that it was probably because they cheated on their essays by copying an essay that Jimmy had found online

“I asked you here because inknow full well that you copied an essay that you found online as i am the one who wrote it in the first place, i have let a lot of stuff slide as you four are the best players on the football team but i think you need to be punished for this“ said the teacher knowing the best punishment

“Cmon miss cant you let us off with a slap on the wrist like usual?” Asked mike hoping not to be punished to severely

No and your punishment shall be...”

What is their punishment

1555333221.content:
Brad couldn’t wait to go on vacation, he had read all about the beautiful historic city of Sinder, he loved the art, the architecture of the old art and most Importantly of all the history of the royal family, he loved their traditions and how interesting all the outfits they wore were.

Especially the princess who always seemed to be in massive ball gowns that would make a Disney princess blush, heck he was so excited that he didn’t even wait to go to his hotel room and unpack to vibist the royal palace taking his duffel bag filled with his clothes with him.

Although he wasn’t happy about having to share his vacation with his Twin sister Beth as both of them weren’t on the best of terms, but thankfully he didn’t have to worry about a thing as they both agreed to visit separate places in Sinder but also stay in different hotels to he was basically by himself with no one to stop him from doing what he wanted. And as Brad went through the gorgeous main hall of the palace where roofs had angels painted on to him and the walls were covered with portraits of princesses and knights, one meaningless thought that Brad thought he’d never get the answer too.

‘I wonder what I’d be like to live like a princess’.

And while Brad was wandering through the halls taking photos, the princess that he thought looked so gorgeous in all of her dresses was sitting in a security room filled with cameras with her trusty hand maid the beautiful brunette Natasha sitting with the princess waiting diligently.

The princesses name was Bertha but she’d rather just be called the princess as people nicknamed her over the earful name her farther choose for her. She had long flowing blonde locks and was sitting in her massive puffy silver blue ball gown which stuck out immensely making it look like she was being consumed by her dress, but to the princess that did not matter as their was only one thing that was on her mind. And that was to escape her lifestyle.

She hated being a royal and hated being a princess even more, she was never allowed to anything by herself, she had to attend boring meetings and act interested in other royal affairs and worse act romantically interested in other princes. The only thing she never hated about her life was Natasha who was kind enough and trustworthy enough to help the princess break free for a little while.

“Oh Natasha why must none of these women look like me, they all look so bland and normal!” Woefully proclaimed the princess to her servant who felt bad and wanted nothing more to make the princess happy.

“Do not worry Princess, you must remember that every princess gets their happy ending eventually”. Replied Natasha using the old saying fairy tail saying to ease the Princess just like she did in the past.

The Princess smiled in comfort at Natasha’s reply but was set In just calling it a night and accepting her fate. She glanced at one strange girl, she clearly had no taste in clothes as she was wearing a dark green shirt with light blue jeans and white sneakers. But she looked like she fit every single measurement, and the best part was the girls face she looked identical to the princess it was perfect.

Except the strange girl wasn’t even a girl at all but in fact Brad who was about to have his princess thought realised.

“Natasha look look! A girl who fits my appearance and measurements perfectly!” Proclaimed a excited Princess.

Natasha looked at the strange girl and could almost immediately tell that they were a boy. “But princess I think that is a boy look his name tag says brad”.

But the Princess was persistent insisting that Brad could mean Brada a common name in some places in Germany. But the Princess noticed something go that could easily convince Natasha to help her.

“But look Natasha at their duffel bag it has a bra sticking out of it so they must be a girl”. Retorted the princess successfully as Natasha decided that she must be right and decided that this Brada would take over the princesses place.

“But princess how will we go about convincing or capturing them?” Questioned Natasha.

The princess took a second to come up with a game plan and decided that.....
1555333221.title: The princess and the pauper

choices: Yes to the offer, making the princess excited and truly happy
No to the offer, making the princess resort to drastic measures
15553332211.content:
The princess took a second to come up with a game plan. They could wait for the strange girl to go to wherever she’s staying and kidnap her, but what kinds of princess would that make her. She decided that it would be better to just send her trust worthy hand maid Natasha out to bring Brada to her.

“Natasha bring the strange girl to my private quarters so I may speak with her.” Commanded the princess as Natasha nodded her head and quickly paced herself towards Brada.

Meanwhile Brad was busy taking pictures of the beautiful dinner hall that the royal family of sinder eat In and was amazed by how beautiful designed the room was. He couldn’t wait to see his mom and dad again so he could show them all of the amazing pictures he had taken, and he couldn’t wait to rub it in his sisters face when she realised how he had a way cooler and more interesting vacation than her.

However while Brad was busy daydreaming, he hadn’t noticed the gorgeous hand maid walk towards him and jumped when she patted his shoulder to get his attention releasing a embarrassingly effeminate gasp which made him blush.

“Excuse me sorry to disturb you but are you Brada?” Asked Natasha in a gentle tone which calmed Brad down a little after the surprise appearance of her.

And what calmed Brad down more was how beautiful and stunning the hand maid was, she looked like a model out of a magazine and Brad was back to feeling a bit nervous, thinking that she probably didn’t speak great English.

“Uh yeah I-I’m Brada” blurted out Brad who sweater under his breath once he realised the mistake he made. However Brad couldn’t care once he saw the beautiful smile that Natasha showed him.

“Oh that’s wonderful Brada please come with me the princess has requested an audience with you”. Explained Natasha as she grabbed Brads hand and forced him to follow her through royal hallway after Royal hallway.

And Brad couldn’t be more excited. He couldn’t believe his luck,
He was gonna meet the princess, what an honour. An honour that Beth could never beat when it came to her telling whatever boring things she did on vacation, he couldn’t help but smile and snap a few photos of the hallways just to show how amazing he palace was to everybody when he got home.

Brad also really enjoyed talking to Natasha through the hallway, she clearly knew the history of the place very well and was happy that she was getting to introduce someone so interested in the culture of Sinder to the queen, while Natasha could only think how lucky they were to get someone so familiar with the culture of Sindsr to be the princesses replacement.

Eventually Natasha and Brad reached the princesses private quarters and when entering the room Brad was amazed by What he saw.

The princesses quarters could fit his house into it three times over. And the walls were a beautiful cyan blue with a gorgeous art nouveau wallpaper while the floors were made from a beautiful oak wood and buffed to perfection.

And the princess was sitting patiently by her 17th century style vanity table with a smile on her face when seeing Brad or to her Brada.

Brad was excited to meet the princess however all that excitement disappeared quickly when she revealed her motives for summoning him in a grateful speech.

“My my strange girl you’re even more beautiful that’s i thought you’d be Brada. You’re probably wondering why I summoned you, well I shall keep the answer from you no longer. I am 18 the same age as you I’m guessing and I am fed up with this life of royalty, I hate wearing poofy dresses and only acting in ways that the singer culture renders suitable. I wish to break free for a year or a month and experience the real world for myself, will you Brada my twin from another lifetime help me be free?”

Brad was left speechless, perplexed and utterly embarrassed by what she had said and let out an awkward laugh as he prepared himself to shatter the princesses dreams.

“Um princess, w-while I’m grateful for you’re offer i can’t take it because.....because....because I am a man”. Awkwardly uttered out Brad

The princess laughed at this finding the joke hilarious while her hand maid had a look of sadness on her face.

“Oh that’s funny Brada, I’m glad you have such a sense of humour about this”. Said the princess trying to lie to herself.

Brad then sighed in sadness as he realised what he had to do.

“My names brad princess, and here is my passport and drivers license I’m sorry but it’s true”.

When the princess read all of the legal documents thoroughly tears began to well up in her eyes as she burst into tears while the hand maid burst into action to comfort her princess.

“Oh this is just so unfair why oh why god do you play me for a fool in such a way! All I wanted was to be free from the culture and royalty of Sinder for one day and instead you play me for a fool and trap me in my cage like a songbird”. Cried out the Princess feeling doomed to her life of royalty.

Brad felt like a monster right now. While the princess was waiting for her Princess Charming to come and save her from this castle Brad was nothing but a devil in disguise. Until Natasha cane up with a mischievous idea as she decided to use her looks to get Brad to hell then out.

“You know Brada or Brad you still look just as cute and pretty as the princess even if you are a boy. Are you sure there’s no chance you could help us out at all. I promise it’d be worth your while, you’d get to learn all about the culture of Sinder and experience all the joys of royalty that the princess had grown tired off. Oh can’t you just pretend to be our gorgeous princess for a little while?” Pleaded Natasha in a sultry tone hoping that it would work.

Brad took a second to consider his options, if he agreed he could get to know the gorgeous maid better and experience the culture of sinder at its finest, but at the same time he’d have to be dressed in a big poofy dress and act like a girl while also having to do god knows what else. While if he said no he could dress and act like himself and have a nice normal vacation while sacrificing getting to know the maid better and experiencing the luxury of royalties first hand.

Brad took a second to think as he looked at the desperate princess and the gorgeous maid and decided to say......
15553332211.title: Natasha would escort Brada to her private quart...

155533322111.content:
Brad looked at the desperate princess and the gorgeous maid and reluctantly said “well ok fine but I better get my life back soon”.

And with those few words the princess exploded with energy as she shrieked in glee and delight running over to Brad and hugging him.

“Oh thank you! thank you! Thank you so much! I’ll make his up to you someday I promise! Now let’s get you outta those ratty boy clothes and into my beautiful dress”.

Before Brad could even say anything Natasha had already pulled down his jeans and boxers making him shriek and cover up which made the princess giggle a little.

“Well I can certainly see how much of a man you are now, I think we’re gonna need. Some tape” explained Natasha as Brad blushed while also feeling happy that his privates were big enough to warrant tape.

And after a few minutes of Brad using a lot of tape. The maid and her princess got to work on making their Cinderella the belle of the ball.

Brad was left dizzy by how quickly and efficiently the two were working together, as in a few seconds the maid had already forced Brad into a tight corset which made him feel like he was in space with no oxygen, while The princess had fling of all of her clothes and had already dressed herself in Brads clothes to which she was....less than satisfied with.

After a few deep breaths Brad was in a course which made his already feminine body look petite enough to be the princesses

Natasha smirked at Brad who was feeling uncomfortable in the corset and she snickered. “Don’t worry Brada that’s as tight as the corset will get, but now we need to do something about his short blonde mess you call you’re hair.” Explained Natasha in a joking way with Brad hoping that Brada wouldn’t be a nickname that sticks with the maid he slowly was gaining a crush for.

The princess then jumped in proclaiming “not to worry my sweet maid and my adorable double I had a wig pre made for just such a occasion”. As she worried in case the girl who took her place had short hair.

The princess then pulled out the blonde wig which was identical to her own hair. It was long blonde hair that flowed gracefully. She then plonked it straight into Brads head and the maid combed it too accurate perfection like she was a machine in a factory. When Brad saw his new hairstyle for a while he blushed finding it embarrassing by how much he actually do look like the princess.

The princess meanwhile found it amazing saying “don’t worry Brad you’re just as pretty as a princess as me”. Making Natasha laugh as she could tell that the princess didn’t know how he was really feeling.

The princess then shaved her hair and ruffled it to make it as messy as Brads.

The princes then joined Natasha in using cosmetics to make Brad look more feminine as they made him wear the princesses Pink hearted bra and stuffed it to make it look as big as hers, they then used blush mascara eyeliner and a lot of lip gloss to make Brad look like he had stepped straight out of the princesses Mirror, they finally pierced his ears with the pink heart earrings of the princess and gave him a manicure painting his fingernails bright pink.

The princess smiled and said “wow you look great” to make her double feel more comfortable, while Natasha playfully chimed in saying “yeah I thought you were a cute guy but you’re a adorable little princess” making Brad blush more while hoping that she wasn’t into this sort of thing if they went out.

The maid and the princess then grinned mischievously as the princess said “and now it’s time for my double to enjoy a royal dress” and in a minute flat Brad went from sitting down calmly to being pulled and tugged by the girls as they dressed him up.

The princess slid her small panties onto Brad which made him blush as he felt his right they were and saw the pink hearts it was covered in, mking him hope the princesses under garments weren’t all so childish.

Meanwhile the maid was forcing Him into the princesses beautiful sparkling blue ball gown, making her smile as she thought about how much he looked like Cinderella in it and how much she wished she’d one day be cinderella.

Finally they forced him to wear a pair of high heels with Diamonds in them to make them sparkle and white opera gloves, with the final touch being the princesses very own tiara now resting on Brads head.

When Brad got a look at himself he was shocked, he no longer looked like a boy on holiday, but the gorgeous princess of Sinder.

The maid saw his shock and snickered at it. “Oh Brad I think you’re the prettiest boy playing princess I’ve ever seen”. Making him snap back to reality and blush.

The princess meanwhile now looked just like Brad and had taken his phone, wallet and passport. This was it. She was finally free for a while to explore and she didn’t know if she could do it she felt a tear well up in her eye as she realised that she would be leaving Natasha alone but took solace in the fact that she clearly left her in good company.

Natasha saw the princesses fear and hugged her saying “don’t worry my princess go out outside and have yourself the adventure of a life time me and Brada can handle things”. As both the maid and princess hugged crying.

Eventually they stopped hugging and The princess turned around to look at Brad.

“Thank you so much for doing this for me I promise you one day I will repay the massive debt I owe you”.

Making Brad smile, however that smile left quickly as he remembered to tell the princess something. “Oh wait Princess before you go I must ask that you don’t talk to my sister on vacation if she finds out I’m here she’ll blackmail me into being her maid or something like that”.

With Natasha giving him a look and Brad instantly realising his mistake and saying “oh I mean no offence”.

They both snickered at it though and the princess promised to not talk to Beth.

Natasha then escorted the princess dressed like Brad with all of his belongings into the tourist area and told Brad that his first duty as princess was on a note on the vanity table.

Brad looked at the note and saw the first thing he’ll be doing is....

1555333221111.content:
Brad looked at the note and saw the first thing he would be doing would be princess training with Natasha. This made Brad excited while also extremely nervous. He was excited at the chance for some alone time with Natasha as she was beautiful and nice and Brad knew that he had feelings for the hand maid. But that also made him extremely nervous as he knew that if he messed up then Natasha would hate his guts.

Meanwhile Natasha was watching the princess disappear into the crowd of tourists feeling miserable. She felt she was watching her little sister go out into the outside world all alone, hoping that she would be ok. But Natasha knew that this is what her princess wanted and she would have to respect her wishes, and ensure that Brada, the cute boy playing princess would need to learn how to walk talk, pose and smile like a princess from her.

She wasn’t looking forward to it as she knew how tedious it was to teach the princess how to do all of it and knew that teaching a boy to do it would surely be worse, she sighed as she thought to herself how great it would be if someone could just look after her like a princess, and treat her like the princess she was always destined to be.

Natasha then walked back into the princesses private quarters to find Brad slouching in a chair while waiting. She sighed and pulled him to his feet as she began to speak to brad.

“Ok Brada as you read I’m going to be teaching you all about the skills a pretty princess like you should have before you can go to royal events and since I taught the princess all about being a princess, it is only fair that i should teach her replacement, even if they are a boy”.

Brad nodded his head understanding that a lot was expected of him if he had to be the princess of sinder now.

Natasha smiled at Brads determination to do good, at least he would be trying his best she thought. “Good Brada now the first thing I’ll teach you today is how to walk in heels, I know that to a boy especially one as unkempt as you this will be a struggle but I’m sure with you’re determination you’ll get the hang of it easily.” Explained Natasha with confidence, however all of that confidence would go out the window when Brad started walking.

Brad was already a natural in walking in high heels which shocked Natasha immensely. She’s didn’t understand how could such a messy boy be walking so naturally, no he wasn’t walking he was strutting with natural confidence.

Brad looked over to see Natasha gobsmacked by the sight of Brad strutting and smiled. However Natasha saw this and Grinned back slyly.

“My my you’re such a natural in Heels Brada, I guess this isn’t you’re first time crossdressing is it?” Making Brad blush in embarrassment and look miserable as he stopped walking .

Natasha immediately noticed the look on Brads face and felt bad realising she hurt his feelings “oh Brada I’m sorry I didn’t mean anything by it honestly I’m amazed you’re so good in heels”.

Brad then smiled back slightly at Natasha and explained why her joke made him feel sad “sorry it’s just that well my sister used to bully me and blackmail with bad test scores and stealing money from my dad into dressing up as her twin sister. I learned all about how to walk in heels and pose like her but I hated it, she was a huge bully to me and forced me to do things I hated like go on nights out with her and her friends where they’d try to hook me up with guys, I felt like her toy doll more than her brother and I hated it so much.” explained Brad as he held back tears.

Natasha felt earful and hugged brad and apologised Profusely. “I’m so sorry Brad, I can only imagine how awful that made you feel and I understand why you want the princess to not talk to her while she’s out as you. But I must say even though I’ve only known you for a few hours you seem lovely and if it cheers you up I think you’re terrific you’re so talented and I’m glad the princess chose you to be her temporary replacement. I can tell you’ll make an amazing princess as you’ve already surpassed my expectations”.

Brad blushes at this feeling so happy his crush gave him such a lovely compliment, even if it was for being a amazing princess.

Natasha realised what she said and laughed with Brad for a minute, with both of them being glad that they met the other.

Natasha then decided it was time to continue with Brads princess training. “Well Brada I’m glad you can walk in heels but let’s move on to the next part of princess training which I expect you can handle gracefully”.

Natasha then explained that Brad had to learn how to...

info.brief_description: Someone swaps clothes with someone else in various scenario's.
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping clothes with another person because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapters may be deleted if it creates too much confusion.

Try to write decently sized chapters, after the first few branches do not create chapters containing only a few sentences, these will be deleted if they get out of hand.
The style of writing will be in third person, please keep this theme throughout the story.

On a more positive note! I will recognize good chapters in some form, which will usually be in the form of points.

Other than these rules, have fun with it and let you imagination go wild!

If you like this story, check out my sister series:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2212132-A-curious-trait-exchange
